title: COURSE + WEBINAR OPERATIONS SPECIALIST (Launch Support)
description:
COURSE + WEBINAR OPERATIONS SPECIALIST (Launch Support)



Type: Part-time / Project-based (10–20 hrs/week, potential to extend)

Location: Remote (Philippines preferred)

Start: ASAP

Timezone: Must overlap with PH time for coordination

Rate: Competitive / based on experience



To apply, start your message with: PHOENIX OPS



Role Summary

We need a Course + Webinar Operations Specialist to own the build, upload, organization, and QA of our program assets. This is execution-heavy and detail-driven: you ensure the course platform and webinar flow work end-to-end.



Note: This role is not
 marketing and does not require
 copywriting.



Reporting: Reports to Anthony and collaborates with team leads as needed.





Responsibilities (Core)

1) Course Platform Build + Upload

 • Build course structure (Start Here + Modules)

 • Upload videos + PDFs (workbooks/exercises)

 • Ensure correct order, naming, navigation, and version control



2) QA + Launch Readiness

 • Test on desktop + mobile

 • Confirm downloads + video playback

 • Catch duplicates/missing assets

 • Maintain a master asset tracker (status = READY)



3) Webinar Ops Support (Non
)

 • Coordinate readiness of slides/resources/links

 • QA the flow (registration ? attendance ? replay access)

 • Confirm everything is “launch-ready” before go-live





Requirements

 • Strong attention to detail + QA mindset

 • Comfortable with checklists/trackers/deadlines

 • Clear communicator (Done / Next / Blocked)



Tools

 • Google Drive / T0ggles

 • Zoom

 • 





What Success Looks Like (First 7–14 Days)

 • Course shell built + master asset tracker created

 • Upload + QA process running cleanly with “READY” assets clearly tracked





How to Apply



Start with PHOENIX OPS and include:

 1. Your course platform / webinar ops experience

 2. Availability (PH time) + hourly rate

 3. One example of a project you shipped + what you owned

 4. Quick answer: What’s the most common mistake in course uploads/webinar prep, and how do you prevent it?

title: Social Media Account Manager / Content Supervisor (Later + QA)
description:
Social Media Account Manager / Content Supervisor (Later + QA)



Part-Time | Long-Term | Philippines Only | $6–$10/hr



We are a fast-growing digital marketing agency working primarily with restaurant and hospitality brands. We’re looking for a detail-oriented Social Media Account Manager / Content Supervisor to oversee scheduling, accuracy, and quality control across multiple client accounts using Later.



This role is focused on reviewing and approving content before it goes live, ensuring every post follows brand guidelines and is scheduled correctly.



???? Responsibilities



You will be responsible for reviewing, managing, and approving scheduled social media content.



Core Responsibilities



Manage and oversee multiple restaurant social media accounts



Review all scheduled posts inside Later before publishing



Ensure all content follows each client’s brand guidelines



Verify:



Correct images/videos are used



Captions match the correct menu items



Promotions align with the correct days and times



Happy Hour, brunch, specials, and events are scheduled accurately



No outdated pricing, offers, or incorrect items are posted



Prevent mistakes such as:



Scheduling Happy Hour posts on non-Happy Hour days



Using the wrong image for a promotion or menu item



Incorrect dates, times, or offers



Coordinate with caption writers, editors, and supervisors



Flag issues before content goes live and request corrections



Maintain clean, organized content calendars



Report recurring issues or workflow gaps



???? This Role Is NOT



Content creation



Video editing



Graphic design



This is a quality control, review, and approval role.



???? Requirements



Strong experience using Later (REQUIRED)



Experience managing or supervising social media accounts



Restaurant or hospitality experience strongly preferred



Excellent attention to detail



Strong English reading and comprehension skills



Highly organized and process-driven



Comfortable managing multiple clients



Able to follow SOPs and brand guidelines precisely



Reliable internet and consistent availability



Long-term mindset



? Bonus Skills



Experience working at a digital marketing agency



Familiarity with restaurant menus, promotions, and operations



Experience with content approval or QA workflows



???? Compensation



$6–$10 USD per hour (Part-Time)



Rate is based on experience, Later expertise, and accuracy level



Entry-level candidates will start toward the lower end



Higher rates reserved for candidates with proven restaurant + agency + Later experience



Opportunity for increased hours and rate as responsibilities grow



Please include your expected hourly rate when applying.



???? How to Apply



Please submit:



Your resume



A short description of your experience using Later



Examples of accounts or brands you’ve managed (if available)



Answers to the following:



How do you prevent scheduling mistakes before posts go live?



Have you managed restaurant accounts before?



How do you review content for multiple clients efficiently?



What tools have you used for scheduling and approvals?



???? Test Assignment (Shortlisted Applicants Only)



Qualified candidates may be asked to complete a short content review test to assess attention to detail and decision-making.

title: Social Media Thumbnail Designer & Channel Strategist
description:
SEND YOUR UPDATED RESUME, PORTFOLIO AND LINK TO VOICE RECORDING - Applications without these requirements will be automatically rejected.



***MUST BE OKAY WITH ONCE A MONTH SALARY***



We are looking for a Social Media Designer & Multi-Platform Manager to design engaging content and manage daily posting across multiple social media platforms. This role combines creative design, content strategy, community engagement, and analytics to grow and maintain an active online presence.



You will be responsible for end-to-end social media management, from content creation and scheduling to audience interaction and performance reporting.

Monitor and respond to comments, messages, and audience interactions

Repurpose YouTube content for use across social platforms

Requirements

Strong design skills with knowledge of platform-specific best practices

Excellent English writing skills for captions and community engagement

Self-starter capable of building content strategies and workflows

Data-driven approach to content optimization and performance tracking



Role Details

Part-time: 20 hours per week

East Coast US schedule with weekly meetings (availability between 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM ET)

Tools provided: Hootsuite access and workspace account

title: LinkedIn Outreach Virtual Assistant (German Market, C-Level, 20h/week)
description:
We are looking for a detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to support us with manual LinkedIn outreach.

Your task is to send highly personalized LinkedIn messages to C-level decision makers at large brands (CMOs, Heads of Marketing, Brand Directors).



This is NOT automation and NOT spam.?Every message must feel individual, relevant, and professional.

The outreach is focused on:

* Influencer Marketing

* Branding Campaigns

* TV & Event Sponsorships

* Large-scale brand visibility (banners, activations, content)



Your Responsibilities

* Identify relevant C-level decision makers on LinkedIn

* Research the brand, role, and recent activities

* Write fully personalized LinkedIn messages (no templates only)

* Use German language (with translation tools if needed)

* Track outreach in Google Sheets

* Follow clear messaging frameworks and guidelines



Language & Communication

* Messages are written in German

* You do NOT need to speak German fluently

* You MUST:

    * Be very good at using translation tools (DeepL, Google Translate)

    * Understand professional business tone

    * Avoid robotic or awkward phrasing



Ideal Candidate

This role is perfect for you if you:

? Have experience with LinkedIn outreach or lead generation?? Are comfortable writing individual messages (not mass copy-paste)?? Understand how to communicate with executives & decision makers?? Are organized and reliable?? Can follow strict instructions and tone guidelines

? This role is NOT for you if:

* You prefer automation tools

* You send generic or spammy messages

* You don’t like researching before writing



Working Hours

* 20 hours per week

* Flexible schedule

* Long-term collaboration possible



Compensation

* Paid weekly or bi-weekly

* Performance-based increase possible



Tools You Will Use

* LinkedIn

* Google Sheets

* Translation tools (DeepL / Google Translate)



How to Apply

To apply, please answer the following:

1. Do you have experience with LinkedIn outreach?

2. Have you written messages to C-level executives before?

3. Which translation tools have you used?

4. Are you comfortable writing fully personalized messages?

5. Write “LinkedIn C-Level” at the beginning of your application.?

Applications without “LinkedIn C-Level” will not be considered.

Looking forward to your application!

title: Sales Support Executive
description:
About the company

At Miraco Nutripharm, we are dedicated to advancing health and improving lives. Our goal is to relieve 1 billion people worldwide of pain and discomfort. If you know of anyone who has been worried about or suffered from any health problems, join us in making a positive impact by reducing the pain and distress others have to endure.



Job description

As the Sales Support Executive, you will be responsible for supporting a broad range of commercial tasks within the organisation. This includes/will include customer service, order processing, maintaining sales call sheets and supporting operational workflows through process documentation and improvement as well as research and analysis to achieve business stability and growth. The ideal candidate will have a good understanding of commercial processes and be an agile multi-tasker with strong organisational and problem-solving skills. 



Key Responsibilities:



Commercial Administrative Support

- Assist in researching and compiling information to support various business functions

- Work cross functionally and support management in scheduling, tracking project milestones and monitoring deliverables to ensure business goals are successfully met 

- Provide administrative and operational support as required



Customer Experience

- Onboard new customers, ensuring a smooth transition and successful implementation

- Maintain accurate records of client interactions and progress in ERP & CRM tools

- Monitor customer health scores and proactively address any issues or risks

- Review account performance metrics and sales value regularly to track growth trends and identify opportunities.

- Proactively recommend strategies to strengthen account potential, optimise visibility, and drive incremental sales across channels.

- Maintain and update Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for smooth and stable daily operations across different departments 

- Identify and improve areas to increase operational efficiencies and business workflows to optimise resource utilisation  

- Collaborate with sales, marketing, and support teams to deliver an excellent customer experience

- Identify upsell and cross-sell opportunities in coordination with the sales team

- Sales order processing with our ERP system

- Collaborate with Operations and Fulfilment team to ensure timely enquiries handling, order processing and delivery 

- Build and maintain strong, long-term relationships with customers

- Analyze customer data and feedback to improve services and retention strategies

- Act as the voice of the customer internally to advocate for their needs and feedback while taking into account business objectives 

- Monitor and manage regional e-commerce platforms (e.g., Shopee, Lazada) to ensure product listings are accurate, - compliant, and authorised.

- Implement seamless and impactful customer journeys across our multi-store eCommerce website (B2C & B2B), CRM loyalty programs and official marketplace store (Shopee & Lazada)

- Optimize customer interactions across touchpoints to increase satisfaction, loyalty and lifetime value, while collaborating closely with digital & marketing, sales and IT teams.



Requirements:

- Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent qualification

- Computer literacy with knowledge of Google Drive and MS Office applications

- Minimum 2 years of remote work experience

- Experience working with ERP & CRM systems is a bonus

- Ability to work independently and in a team-oriented environment 

- Strong attention to detail, problem-solving and communication skills

- Effective time management and organisational skills while being adaptable and proactive to initiate process changes

- High levels of integrity and professionalism



Please submit your resume to

title: Creative Strategist & Content Producer
description:
About the company

At Miraco Nutripharm, we are dedicated to advancing health & improving lives. Our goal is to relieve 1 billion people worldwide of pain & discomfort. If you know of anyone who has been worried about or suffered from any health problems, join us in making a positive impact by reducing the pain & distress others have to endure.

Job description

We're looking for a Creative Strategist & Content Producer to shape how our health & pharmaceutical brands communicate across both digital & offline channels. You'll craft effective strategies that translate scientific credibility into compelling storytelling & creative assets - helping us engage our diverse audience as we expand our presence regionally. 



The Creative Strategist & Content Producer will be the visionary link between our brand identity, compelling content creation & drive measurable performance across all key channels. This role is responsible for developing & testing high-impact creative strategies as well as producing content assets (visual, video, copy) internally, specifically designed to drive traffic, increase conversion rates, lower Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC) & drive overall revenue growth for our Shopify, Shopee & Lazada stores via social media as well as paid advertising platforms.



You'll work across multiple channels & markets to plan, create & optimize content that builds awareness, strengthens partnerships & supports the new channels of the business. This role is ideal for someone who enjoys balancing creativity, analytics & brand strategy in the health supplement industry. 



Key Responsibilities:

Creative Strategy

- Platform & Channel Strategy: Craft tailored creative strategies for B2C & B2B audiences optimized for platform-specific best practices & formats that align with brand goals & regulatory requirements in each market (e.g., Meta carousel ads, vertical video for TikTok/Reels, static product carousels for Shopee/Lazada e-commerce banner ads).

- Hypothesis Generation & A/B Testing: Develop robust creative testing matrices, formulate clear hypotheses for creative elements (hooks, calls-to-action, visual styles, copy length) that drive measurable improvements in Click-Through Rate (CTR) & Conversion Rate (CVR).

- Audience Segmentation: Translate target audience data & segmentation provided by media buyers into resonant creative themes, ensuring content speaks directly to different stages of the marketing funnel (awareness, consideration, conversion).

- Competitive Analysis: Continuously keep up to date with competitors & industry trends, identifying new & successful creative formats, hooks & messaging to finetune our strategy.

In-House Content Production & Execution 

- Performance Creative Development: Lead the end-to-end creative concept development & production for all organic & paid media campaigns (Meta, TikTok, Google/YouTube, etc.) that align with brand & campaign goals, focusing on high-volume, quick-turnaround testing required for performance marketing.

- Hands-on Asset Creation: Directly produce & edit native social content & performance ads using existing assets, stock libraries & internal resources. This includes:

i. Plan platform-specific content calendars: Cover educational, promotional & corporate communications

ii. Static/Image Editing: Adapt product photography, create ad variations & design simple graphics & banner ads

iii. Video Editing: Fast-paced assembly, cutting, adding text overlays, music & effects for short-form, vertical video (UGC-style, product demos, testimonials)

- Copywriting: Develop high-converting ad copy, landing page headlines & social media captions that align with the creative strategy & brand voice, with a focus on clear value propositions & strong CTAs.

- Asset Management: Ensure all campaign assets are correctly tagged, archived & deployed across relevant channels (Shopify, Shopee, Lazada store fronts & advertising platforms).

- Testing & Optimization: apply insights & analytics to refine & optimize content effectiveness across platforms.

Performance & Reporting

- Data-Driven Insights: Work closely with the Marketing Manager to analyze creative performance reports, identifying which creative variables are driving results (or failing) across Shopify, Shopee & Lazada traffic.

- Iteration & Optimization: 

i. Develop, adapt or review content & formats to improve engagement & performance

ii. Use performance data (ROAS, CPA, CTR, CVR) to rapidly iterate on existing creative assets & inform future strategy, ensuring a continuous cycle of improvement & optimization

Storefront Integration: Integrate winning creative messages & visuals onto the respective e-commerce storefronts (product pages, banners) to ensure a cohesive customer journey.

Multi-Channel Storytelling

- Content cohesion: Ensure content is aligned where possible across digital & print media, including LinkedIn, Instagram,
, YouTube, e-commerce platforms, brochures & trade materials.

- Tailor content: To achieve relevance & effectiveness across different stages of the audience journey — from brand awareness & education to conversion.

- Storytelling & visual consistency: To strengthen brand trust & recognition.

Compliance & Brand Integrity

- Uphold regulatory & ethical communication standards across all marketing activities.

- Ensure all content complies with regulatory guidelines & marketing requirements in each country we operate in, including product claims, advertising language & digital promotions.

- Maintain brand credibility by ensuring all communications are factual & aligned with company values.

- Collaborate with internal teams to review materials for accuracy, effectiveness & compliance before publication.



Requirements:

- 3–5 years of experience in creative strategy, content creation, social media, or brand marketing — ideally in health supplements, healthcare or wellness.

- Strong understanding of social media trends & platform best practices (Meta (FB/IG), LinkedIn, TikTok, YouTube, Google, Generative AI).

- Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, Premiere Pro), CapCut, Canva, Figma, or similar tools.

- Excellent writing, editing & visual storytelling skills — adopt a strategic approach to design that integrates marketing & commercial goals.

- Excellent communication, project management & cross-functional collaboration skills.

- Familiarity with regulatory communication standards or track record in health supplements or healthcare industry is a plus.



Please send your applications to

title: Australian Asset Finance Operations Specialist / Virtual Assistant
description:
Hi there,



I am currently looking for an additional operations specialist/executive (preferably but not necessarily with Asset Finance/Mortgage Finance experience), to help with our day to day operations, loan administration and pipeline management.



Experience:

Worked in the financial services industry for over 2 years.

Worked in another related industry (insurance, real estate, financial planning, accounting for) 5 + years.

Is familiar with basic Australian Laws and Governance.



Skills:

Very High Attention to Detail!

Adaptable and can quickly pick up new tasks!

Highly trustworthy!

Excellent written and verbal communication skills!



About the company:



Swyft Finance is an award winning smaller ticket finance brokerage situated in Sydney Australia, that has now been operating for the last 2+ years. We have just been nominated for the rising star award with our aggregator (Connective) and have experienced tremendous growth.



Our main area of speciality includes

Commercial Asset Finance (Trucks, Machines, Vans, Cars, Robotics)

Consumer Asset Finance (Cars, Bikes, Recreational Assets)

Commercial Unsecured Finance (Line of credits, business term loans, Invoice Finance)

Consumer Unsecured Finance (Personal Loans)



Pay: TBD (Between ? 45, 000 to ? 65, 000) and your skills.



Unlike most brokerages that work with 8 - 10 lenders, our panel currently has over 60 lenders. Our business is positioned as a support service to mainly three professional groups which includes:



Mortgage Brokers

Accountants

Financial Planners



These professionals refer their clients to us, and we have arranged a commission agreement for them when they refer a successful customer.



About the job:



Your role in the company will include wearing multiple hats at the same time, and you will be an integral part of the team.



Data Entry of customer details into the Mercury Platform

Proofreading and ensuring loan documents are correctly executed

Assessing bank statements and business financials

Submitting loan applications across multiple lender platforms

Creating and improving/suggesting new Standard Operating Procedures

Writing invoices and Recipient Created Tax Invoices

Understands the requirements of making a loan submission





The characteristics we look for in a successful candidate:



Strong attention to detail.

Is focussed on understanding the whole picture, learning the business and asking questions (instead of just completing tasks blindly).

Is trustworthy as they will be handling sensitive information.

Is independent, and picks up new skills quickly.

Is hard working, and will always make sure the job is done correctly.



Benefits of working with Swyft Finance:



Bonuses and rewards structure can be negotiated.

Open minded employer, who wants to learn from their VA and take their advice on board.

Daily interaction with employer

7am - 3:30pm will be your working hours

Work from home

Strong career progression and learning opportunities.

Flexible Vacation (just ask me if you need time off and we can organize)



How to apply for this job:



Send me an
 to 

Subject will have to be “I want to work with you [First Name and Last Name] from [(the website address for Swyft Finance)]” [This will require you to search me and find me on Linkedin And research the company]

Copy and paste the Swyft Finance Logo in the

At the top of your message write 2-3 sentences on why you would like this position, and why you are a good fit. Do not write more than that or else your application will be deleted.

Under that name 5 lenders in Australia that are not a big bank.





What is the recruitment process:



If we are happy with your above submission, you will be directed to a small assignment and can schedule your own interview with us.

The deadline for the submission will be the 2400 (AEST) before the day of your interview.

We will do an interview and take you through a typical day in the life of working at Swyft Finance

If successful we will organize your start date.



We look forward to hearing from you,



Kind regards,

Saura

title: Paid + Organic Ads Video Editor
description:
I run an e-commerce brand centered around the anti-ai movement and need someone to edit my weekly round of creatives.



Expectations:

- Every Sunday I will share with you an AV script, UGC content, and B-Roll to edit together paid creatives.

- For paid ads, many weeks will be full videos, other weeks it might be edits to pre-existing videos.

- We will also have a weekly output of organic content. The organic content will be more highly edited, although once a solid content library is built, it will get far easier.

- ALL content will be given to you

- Each video will be between 30 and 60 seconds

- Each week the full set of creatives will be due Friday night (your time)



Payment Structure:

- For the first month you will be paid weekly. Assuming we are a good match, we will then go on a monthly basis. 



Additional notes:

- Your primary job will of course be video editing, however I may also ask for you to complete some side tasks in extra time available. These would be very simple and tasks that you could do while listening to music, a podcast, etc.

- ALWAYS apply with a portfolio of short-form (preferably UGC and paid ads) content.

title: Creative Website Designer & Developer for Complete Website Redesign (WordPress / Woo commerce/ elementor)/ Shopify)
description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a skilled and creative website specialist from the Philippines to work part-time on redesigning and optimizing our company website. This role combines design, development, and digital marketing expertise to create a modern, high-performing, and conversion-focused online presence.



Key Responsibilities:

Redesign our website using WordPress + Elementor for a modern, mobile-responsive look.

Optimize WooCommerce product pages for user experience and conversions.

Improve site speed, navigation, and overall usability.

Conduct on-page and technical SEO improvements.

Research and implement relevant keywords for better Google rankings.

Set up and optimize Google Ads campaigns to drive targeted traffic.

Track and report on website and ad performance using Google Analytics.

Collaborate with our team to ensure the site aligns with branding and business goals.



Qualifications:

Proven experience with WordPress and Elementor.

Strong knowledge of WooCommerce setup and customization.

Solid understanding of SEO best practices (on-page, technical, and content optimization).

Experience managing and optimizing Google Ads campaigns.

Familiarity with Google Analytics and other tracking tools.

Strong design sense and ability to create engaging layouts.

Good written and spoken English for clear communication.

Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.



Work Details:

Type: Part-time (project-based with potential for ongoing work)

Hours: Flexible, with some overlap with [your timezone]

Location: Remote – Philippines-based applicants only

Compensation: Competitive – based on skills and experience

title: WordPress Content VA (Copy-Paste & Image Selection)
description:
We are looking for a reliable and detail-oriented Part-Time Virtual Assistant to help publish pre-prepared content to WordPress.



IMPORTANT:

This is NOT a writing job.

All texts, instructions, and structures are already fully prepared using ChatGPT.

Your task is mainly copy & paste and simple execution work.



Main tasks:

- Copy prepared content into WordPress

- Create and format posts exactly as instructed

- Set post title and permalink

- Insert one prepared affiliate link

- Find one suitable, free landscape image on Unsplash

- Download the image and rename the file correctly

- Upload the image to WordPress and add basic image details

- Schedule the post (1 website per day)



Workload:

- 1 website per day

- Each website consists of 30 short posts

- Maximum working time: 2.5 hours per day

- Work is repetitive, structured, and mechanical



Requirements:

- Basic WordPress experience

- Very good attention to detail

- Ability to follow instructions exactly

- Comfortable with copy & paste tasks

- Able to find relevant images on Unsplash

- No German language skills required

- No writing or research required



Working time:

- Around 2.5 hours per day (maximum)

- 7 days per week

- Work can be done at any time of day

- Long-term position



To confirm that you have read this job description carefully,

please start your application message with the word:



RUTSCH



Applications without this word will be ignored.



A short test task will be required before hiring.

title: Head of Customer Relations & Success
description:
Hi there !



We are looking for a Head of Customer Relations & Success for our fast growing education agency.



Your role will be to:

– Onboard clients setting them up for success. Involves understanding their profile really well, the goals they want to achieve, presenting them clearly their next steps and how we will help them, pairing them adequately with our staff, and checking in regularly to make sure they have an emotional quick win from the get-go.

– Actively ensure top-tier satisfaction of our client base (NPS Score tracking), gather feedback and bring back improvement ideas to the team.

– Handle any crises / emergencies swiftly & politely. Requires a customer facing / client first approach, executing with speed, and being results-driven.

– Acomodate clients if they need a mentor replacement, any form of additional support, or question.

– Monitor client journeys, making sure everyone is well set up for success (doing their requirements on time, they are being well attended to by our staff, etc.), and no one is left unattended / underserved.

– You will be expected to provide weekly reports on client satisfaction, issues solved, and improvements to implement.

– You will also be expected to regularly communicate with staff to ensure they are fulfilling clients properly, and they themselves are also supporting clients adequately.



Your overall goal is to ensure the success of each and every client in our growing client base.



This requires you to be very organised, disciplined, results-driven, client-facing,  and speedy in execution. Your priority is ensuring client satisfaction & success for all of our customers, and adding value to them in any way possible. In cases of emergency you can be expected to respond on week-ends.



Company Overview



MIM Prep is an education platform designed to help ambitious students (Bachelor, Master / MBA) land their dream programs. Our core service pairs applicants with a mentor currently studying at the school they’re targeting, creating a “big brother / big sister” relationship that guides them through every step of the application process. Backed by a specialist team, we support students with school selection, CVs, cover letters, essays, and interview prep, plus proven resources and frameworks to maximize their chances of admission. We’re a results-driven, client-first, remote team with key hubs in London and Dubai, united by one goal: helping students unlock life-changing educational opportunities. We’re a fast-growing, international, working primarily with students across Europe and the US. If you care about education, high standards, and helping young people unlock life-changing opportunities, you’ll fit right in here !

title: Executive Assistant (Invoicing & Payroll Focus)
description:
Hi there !



We are looking for an executive assistant who will mainly focus on invoicing & payroll for our company.



We regularly receive between 30-50 invoices every single month, that need to be filtered, forwarded to our accounting software (Xero), correctly uploaded, then approved for final transfer.



You therefore need to be disciplined, responsive, timely, very organised, and attentive to detail. For any invoices missing information, you will have to interact with subcontracts to retrieve the adequate information.



This task will re-occurr monthly, but during most of the month, invoicing & payroll will be quite slow. The rush will be more so in the end of month when all payments need to be made.



You might be expected to contribute to cash management & organisation, based on defined rules within the organisation.



In lapses of time outside of payroll & invoicing (mostly end of month), you will also be assigned on other tasks which can include hiring, onboarding, helping with admin tasks for founders, or research, amongst others.



We are a results driven organisation and might sometimes reach out on week-ends in cases of emergency.



Company Overview



MIM Prep is an education platform designed to help ambitious students (Bachelor, Master / MBA) land their dream programs. Our core service pairs applicants with a mentor currently studying at the school they’re targeting, creating a “big brother / big sister” relationship that guides them through every step of the application process. Backed by a specialist team, we support students with school selection, CVs, cover letters, essays, and interview prep, plus proven resources and frameworks to maximize their chances of admission. We’re a results-driven, client-first, remote team with key hubs in London and Dubai, united by one goal: helping students unlock life-changing educational opportunities. We’re a fast-growing, international, working primarily with students across Europe and the US. If you care about education, high standards, and helping young people unlock life-changing opportunities, you’ll fit right in here !
salary: 650$/month, room for growth for top perf

title: Real Estate Acquisition Manager (Closing Focus)
description:
We are a real estate investment and flipping company looking for an experienced Acquisition Manager to handle qualified seller leads after initial cold calling.



This role is focused on speaking with motivated property owners, asking the right questions, building rapport, handling objections, and helping move deals toward contract. Strong sales skills, clear English, and consistent communication are required.



RESPONSIBILITIES



Speak with interested sellers passed from cold callers



Qualify motivation, timeline, condition, and price



Build rapport and handle objections confidently



Follow a structured sales approach (John Martinez–style preferred)



Help move deals toward agreement and contract



Take clear notes and provide timely updates



REQUIRED EXPERIENCE



2+ years experience as a real estate Acquisition Manager or closer



Very clear English that Americans can easily understand



Strong phone presence and confidence



Proven experience closing or supporting real estate deals



Familiar with seller motivation, negotiation, and objections



Experience working with scripts and structured sales systems



IMPORTANT EXPECTATIONS



This is an execution-focused role, not a management position



Ability to respond promptly during working hours



Comfortable following an existing process and adapting as needed



Stable work history (no frequent short-term roles)



Able to start part-time with the opportunity to grow based on performance



OTHER REQUIREMENTS



Reliable internet and quiet workspace



Consistent availability during scheduled hours (U.S. Eastern Time)



No conflicting work commitments



Professional communication at all times



APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS



Please include:



Short new video introduction (required) explaining your acquisition experience, closing background, and how you handle motivated sellers





Applications without a video will not be considered.

title: [Quick Hire] Remote VA Receptionist Full Time Admin Marketing
description:
Important: Our application process moves very quickly. If you are selected for the next rounds of interviews, you must be able to respond promptly. Candidates who do not respond quickly may be passed over in favor of others.



We are hiring a Remote Spa Receptionist to handle inbound calls and book spa appointments. This is a long-term, performance-based role. Calls are recorded and reviewed regularly. Retention depends on accuracy, professionalism, booking success, consistent attendance, no missed calls during scheduled shifts, fast response time, and the ability to professionally handle complaints and de-escalate upset clients.



To apply: Please copy the questions below, paste them in your reply, and answer each one thoroughly.



(1) Location & Utilities: Where in the Philippines are you currently located? How often have you experienced power or internet outages in the past year? Do you have backup solutions (e.g., generator, mobile hotspot) to ensure your work is not affected?



(2) Home Setup: Will you be working from home? Is your workspace quiet and suitable for handling calls? Do you have your own computer or laptop? Please attach a screenshot of your current internet speed.



(3) Availability & Speed: Can you consistently work seven days a week, six hours per day, and remain available for the full shift without missed calls? How quickly do you typically answer inbound calls? What is your current typing speed in words per minute?



(4) Call & Complaint Experience: Describe your experience with answering inbound calls, booking or scheduling appointments, customer service, following scripts, and handling complaints. Provide one real example of how you de-escalated an upset client and the outcome.



(5) Tools & Systems: What programs, tools, phone systems, or VoIP platforms have you used for handling calls? Do you have any issues with background noise, power outages, or internet interruptions? How do you take notes and log client interactions during calls?



(6) Voice Recordings: Please submit two short voice recordings. Recording one should demonstrate booking an appointment from 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM with a total amount of $60. Recording two should demonstrate handling a double charge for a 90-minute massage where the client sees two $90 charges and is requesting a refund. Your tone should be calm, polite, and professional.



(7) Current Job: Do you currently have another job? If yes, where, how many hours per week, and what are your roles and tasks in that job?



(8) Schedule, Pay & Start Date: Are you able to work seven days a week, six hours per day, during Central Standard Time (CST) hours without conflicts? What is your expected hourly or monthly rate? What is your earliest physical start date if hired?



(9) Marketing, Design & Video: Do you have experience with online marketing, creating content using Canva, or producing short video clips such as
 Reels or similar platforms? Please describe your skills and provide samples of your previous work if available.



(10) Fit, Skills & Experience: Briefly introduce yourself and explain why you would be a good fit for this role. Include what you believe is most important when handling spa clients over the phone, especially during complaints, and what other skills or areas you have a lot of experience in.

title: Video Editor and Photo Editor for Social Media and Ads
description:

I will upload folders of raw videos and photos to Google Drive. Your job is to turn those assets into scroll stopping short form videos and polished images for TikTok, Instagram Reels,
 Ads, and website use.



This is ongoing work, not a one time project.



Responsibilities

• Edit short form videos for TikTok, Instagram, and

• Create multiple ad variations from the same raw footage

• Add captions, text overlays, hooks, and light motion graphics

• Structure videos for strong pacing and retention

• Edit photos for ads, website, and social media

• Resize and crop content for different platforms

• Follow creative direction and reference examples

• Organize and export final files cleanly



What I provide

• Google Drive folders with raw photos and videos

• Examples of ad styles and content I like

• Clear instructions and creative goals

• Ongoing feedback to improve performance



Requirements

• Experience editing short form social content

• Strong sense of pacing, hooks, and visual storytelling

• Content should feel native to TikTok and Instagram

• Experience with ads is a big plus

• Proficient in Premiere Pro, Final Cut, CapCut, or similar

title: Executive Assistant to Founder (Long-Term)
description:
Executive Assistant to Founder (Long-Term)





READ THIS ENTIRE POST BEFORE APPLYING



This is not a typical VA job. If you're looking for easy, low-stress work with flexible deadlines, this is not for you.



Let me be direct about what you're signing up for.





WHO I AM



I run multiple businesses simultaneously. I've hit capacity and need to delegate. I need someone who can take work OFF my plate—not add to it.



I don't need someone who can "help." I need someone who can EXECUTE.





THE BRUTAL TRUTH ABOUT THIS ROLE



Let me be upfront about the hard parts:



Minimal hand-holding. You'll receive clear instructions and context for each task—but I won't walk you through every step. I'll give you the outcome I need. You figure out how to get there.



Emergencies happen. If something critical breaks at 3am your time, we handle it. If a deadline is tomorrow, you stay up and get it done. This isn't every day, but when it happens, I need 100% reliability.



Direct feedback. When you make mistakes (everyone does), I'll tell you directly. No sugarcoating. If you're the type who takes feedback personally instead of using it to improve, this won't work.



High failure rate. If 10 people start a trial, expect 1-2 to make it.





WHY WOULD ANYONE WANT THIS JOB?



Here's what you get:



1. Direct access to a founder, not middle management.

You'll see how decisions are made at the top across multiple businesses. You'll learn by doing, not by watching.



2. Clear path to Executive Assistant ? Right-Hand Person.

I'm not looking for a task-rabbit. I'm looking for someone who can eventually run things when I'm not around.



3. Trust and autonomy once earned.

Micromanagement is exhausting for both of us. Prove yourself, and I'll give you the keys. I want to eventually hand off entire areas of responsibility—operating as my right hand, making decisions on my behalf.



4. Compensation grows with performance.

Starting rate post-probation is $3/hr. Performance is rewarded—raises and bonuses are on the table as you take on more responsibility.





WHAT I NEED FROM YOU



Non-negotiables:



• Minimum 2+ years VA experience (no exceptions—I don't have time to train basics)

• Excellent written AND spoken English (you'll be coordinating with other Filipino freelancers on my team, and we'll work together via Zoom calls—all communication is in English)

• Available for Zoom calls when needed (camera on, clear audio)

• Reliable internet and backup plan if it goes down

• Wise account for payments



The mindset I'm looking for:



• You have a high work ethic and thrive on getting things done

• You're career-first—this isn't a side gig

• You take ownership. "That's not my job" isn't in your vocabulary

• You're resourceful. AI is your friend. You solve problems before escalating

• You can handle pressure without crumbling

• You're direct. Shy and timid won't work here





WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING



I'm in the middle of launching a startup. There's a mountain of tasks that need to get done, and I can't do them all myself. Your job is to take items off my plate and execute them.



This will vary week to week. Some examples:



• Completing assignments and action items I delegate

• Following up on tasks and keeping things moving

• Organizing information, documents, and files

• Communicating with tea
mbers on my behalf

• Handling whatever needs to get done to move the business forward



The work isn't predictable or repetitive. If you need a clearly defined job description with the same tasks every day, this isn't it.



Eventually (if you prove yourself):



• Taking ownership of entire workstreams

• Making decisions on my behalf





COMPENSATION & STRUCTURE



• Position type: Part-time

• Trial period: 2 weeks (fixed-fee per task)

• Probation period: Up to 3 months after passing trial (fixed-fee per task)

• Post-probation: Converted to hourly ($3/hr starting rate)

• Advancement: Executive Assistant promotion available based on performance, with compensation to match

• Timezone: PST

• Payment: Wise, bi-weekly





HOW TO APPLY



Send your application via 
 DM 



To confirm you've read this entire post, begin your cover letter with: "Time is the one resource we can't make more of."



Applications that don't start with this phrase will be automatically rejected.



In your application, include:



1. Your resume/CV



2. Answer these two questions:

   • "Describe a real situation where you handled an urgent, high-pressure task outside of normal working hours. What happened and what did you do?"

   • "If I gave you a task with unclear instructions, what would you do?"



3. Screenshot of your 16 Personalities test results: 



4. Screenshot of your DISC personality assessment results: 



5. Your Wise
 (for paid trial tasks if selected)





WHAT HAPPENS NEXT



Strong applicants will be contacted for next steps, which may include an interview and paid trial assignments. I review all applications personally.

title: AI Automation Engineer (Conversational Systems & WhatsApp Automation)
description:
About the role



bout the Role



We are building AI-driven conversational automation systems where AI directly impacts operations and conversion.



This role owns the design, implementation, and reliability of our AI chat automation across WhatsApp and messaging channels, using workflow logic, LLMs, and system integrations.



This is not an experimental or research role.

You will be responsible for production systems used by real customers at scale.



Key Responsibilities

1. Conversational Automation Design



Design and maintain workflow-based chat automation systems



Build structured, deterministic conversation flows for:



Lead qualification



Booking & scheduling



Pricing & service selection



Human handover



Decide when to use AI vs rule-based logic for accuracy, speed, and cost



Ensure conversations are efficient, clear, and conversion-focused



2. AI Prompt & Knowledge-Base Engineering



Write strict system prompts to prevent hallucination and invalid outputs



Design structured knowledge bases (tables, allowed values, forbidden fields)



Translate real business processes into AI-readable decision logic



Ensure AI responses are accurate, consistent, and business-safe



3. Systems Integration



Integrate chat automation with:



LLM APIs



CRM systems



Calendars / booking tools



Work with JSON payloads, APIs, and webhooks



Handle authentication, error handling, and data validation



Debug and resolve integration or message-delivery issues



4. Cost, Performance & Reliability Ownership



Optimise:



Message count



AI call frequency



Token usage



Design fallback logic for unexpected or invalid user input



Monitor live automation and prevent failure loops



Treat AI automation as mission-critical operational infrastructure



5. Continuous Improvement



Analyse real chat transcripts and user behaviour



Improve automation accuracy and reduce human workload



Iterate safely without breaking live systems



Scale proven flows across multiple business units



Required Skills & Experience (Must-Have)



Experience building chat or workflow-based automation systems



Strong understanding of conversational flow design



Practical experience deploying LLMs in production



Ability to write controlled, deterministic prompts



Comfortable working with:



JSON



REST APIs



Webhooks



Strong logical thinking and structured problem-solving skills



Strongly Preferred (High Advantage)



Experience with WhatsApp automation or messaging platforms



Background in sales, customer service, or operational automation



Experience optimising AI usage for cost and performance



Python or Node.js



Experience owning systems where uptime and accuracy matter

title: Figma Designer with Conversion Optimization Experience (Part-Time, Remote)
description:
Hello there. 



We're looking for a UI/UX Figma designer who enjoys working on conversion-focused pages and collaborating on test ideas.

This is a part-time, long-term role with flexible workload, clear guidance, and open communication.



You don’t need to be a CRO expert. We’ll provide direction, explain what we’re trying to improve, and be available for questions. Your main job is to design clean, thoughtful variants in Figma and occasionally help think through ideas together.



What you’ll be working on:

- Designing and redesigning pages in Figma

- Creating variants for testing in Figma (based on existing pages we'll provide)



What this role is NOT:

- No coding or development

- No analytics, heatmaps, or data analysis

- No test setup or experiment running



Your deliverables are Figma designs only.



How we’ll work together:

- Clear briefs and examples provided

- Async communication (friendly and collaborative)

- We'll give constructive feedback, explain my reasoning, and I’m always open to hearing yours

- Weekly calls, plus quick check-ins if needed



Time & compensation

- $500/month

- Part-time, up to ~80 hours/month (often less)

- Monday–Friday

- Flexible schedule, just need to be responsive during workdays



What we're looking for

- Strong Figma skills

- Experience designing pages with conversion or A/B testing in mind

- Comfortable discussing ideas in English on calls

- Enjoys collaboration and iteration



How to apply:

If this sounds like a fit, please apply here:









Share a few Figma examples and a short note about your experience. No long case studies needed.



Looking forward to meeting you.

title: Sales Operations & Team Lead (Remote) (UK-Focused | Remote)
description:
Full-time | Remote | UK Business Hours



We’re looking for a highly organised sales team leader to keep our sales operation running smoothly and on track.



This role is about ownership and follow-through. You’ll oversee the sales process from new leads through to completion, making sure people do what they’re supposed to do, follow-ups happen, and nothing gets missed.



You don’t need property experience. You do need strong sales experience, good people skills, and the ability to bring structure and control to a busy team.



What you’ll be responsible for:



*Oversee the sales process from lead to completion

*Make sure follow-ups, valuations, and next steps happen on time

*Keep sales moving by chasing actions and removing delays

*Lead and organise sales and support teams (offshore + UK)

*Set priorities, track progress, and improve productivity

*Communicate clearly with clients and internal teams

*Hold teams accountable for output, quality, and timelines



About you



*Experience in sales, sales operations, or sales team leadership

*Very organised, proactive, and detail-focused

*Confident dealing with people and holding them accountable

*Comfortable working in a fast-moving sales environment

*Property experience is a bonus, not required



Why this role:



*Senior, trusted position

*Long-term remote role

*Competitive salary based on experience

title: ASEO Copywriter (AI Search Engine Optimisation) SEO Content Marketing & Website Optimisation
description:
About the Role

We’re seeking a SEO Copywriter with strong traditional SEO foundations and a growing capability in AI Search Optimisation (ASEO).

This role is ideal for someone who loves on-page and off-page SEO, understands how content ranks today and is motivated to work at the leading edge of how content is discovered by AI-driven search environments (ChatGPT, Google SGE, Perplexity, Gemini, Claude).



ASEO expertise is highly desired, but for the right candidate we will support structured upskilling, including access to tools, programs, and workflows to execute at a high level.



At your core will be a deep love and respect for the SEO digital landscape. You’ll be working inside the DigitalflowU ecosystem, supporting Pool Safety Solutions’ national digital infrastructure. This is long-term, systems-driven work across real businesses. You’ll gain exposure to AI-first SEO, structured content frameworks and integrated digital systems, with access to tools and upskilling where your fundamentals are strong. We value clear thinking, ownership and people who want to build something meaningful, contributing towards a company dedicated to humanity plus projects.



You’ll be part of a team alongside an Award-Winning Brand Strategist with a Content Creator implementing an SEO-rich content strategy to improve discoverability for sales across all digital channels.





Key Responsibilities

Write and optimise great compelling SEO-rich and sales-driven copy for:

Websites

Content marketing (newsletters, campaigns, sequences)

Social media copy content (captions, long-form posts, carousels)

Execute strong on-page SEO

Support off-page SEO, including:

Content designed for backlink acquisition

Authority-building and topical relevance strategies

Learn and apply ASEO principles, such as:

Semantic structure and topical clustering

Entity optimisation and contextual authority

AI-readable formatting and clarity

Alignment with AI retrieval and summarisation behaviour

Optimise and refresh existing content to improve:

Rankings and organic performance

AI visibility and citation potential

Conversion and engagement





Do Not Apply If

You "write SEO content" but don't understand it without a website plugin 

You rely on AI to do the thinking rather than the optimising of your time

You don't like structure, briefs or feedback

You want to experiment on us as a guinea pig rather than execute based on solid data.





Required Skills & Experience (Must Have)

An unnatural love of and respect for Branding 

Great SEO copywriting and content optimisation

Strong on-page and off-page SEO skills

Experience with CRM environments,
 marketing software and Website backends

Solid understanding of:

Search intent and keyword mapping

Internal linking and content architecture

Authority and trust signals

Ability to write clear, structured, conversion-focused copy

Comfortable working with briefs, frameworks and optimisation guidelines





Highly Desired (but not mandatory)

Thirst for learning and/or experience with  AI Search Optimisation (ASEO)

Familiarity with:

Entity-based SEO

Optimising content for AI summaries and retrieval

Experience with SEO and content tools such as:

Semrush

AI-assisted content and optimisation workflows

Note: Candidates with strong SEO fundamentals and the right mindset will be supported with training, tools and programs to upskill into ASEO as part of the role.





Application Requirements (Mandatory)

To be considered, applications must include:

A Loom or video walkthrough (5-10 minutes) showcasing your most recent SEO or any ASEO work, covering:

The content or page you optimised

Your on-page and/or off-page strategy

How SEO structure was applied

Any AI-search considerations used (if applicable)

Results or performance improvements (where available)

Links to 2-3 examples of:

Website and/or sales pages you’ve designed and developed

Long-form content

Content systems and
 campaigns you’ve optimised

Applications without a Loom/video will not be reviewed.



Engagement Details

We move fast.

We work with structure.

You will be tested.



Remote Contractor, Consultant

Immediate start preferred

title: Accountant
description:
Note: Please read all of the content below. Apply here: 



Job Description: The Accountant is responsible for preparing journal entries and maintaining the Company’s general ledger and third-party transactions, assisting in the designing controls for the Company’s SOX program. Responsible for ad-hoc accounting, internal controls, and regulatory/compliance, and technical research and analyzing accruals and performing reconciliations.



Task: 

- Post journal entries

- Reconcile GL accounts, inclusive of, clearing any reconciling items

- Prepare various month-end schedules to assist with closing the books

- Prepare various quarter-end SEC schedules

- Prepare various quarter-end Call Report schedules

- Review GL accounts and wbs for reasonableness

- Assist with ad-hoc reporting and analysis

- Assist with correcting problems discovered with the posting of loan activity

- Support the validation of accurate entry of transactions into the accounting system through daily, monthly, and quarterly account reconciliations and monitoring.

- Review and process disbursements for employee travel and expense reports. Support the accounting management team and business units with the budgeting, cost management, reporting, and forecasting initiatives.

- Manage all month end accounting for fixed assets, prepaid expenses, unpaid invoice accruals, payroll, cost allocations, and account reconciliations.

- Maintaining financial records in accordance with GAAP and organizational standards.

- Create and update processes and procedures for journal entries. 



Qualification:



- Certified Public Accountant (CPA) – required

- Minimum 2 years of accounting experience

- Hands-on experience with general ledger accounting, including journal entries, accruals, and reconciliations

- Proven experience supporting month-end and quarter-end close

- Strong knowledge of GAAP and SOX/internal controls

- Experience preparing or supporting regulatory and SEC-related schedules

- High attention to detail with strong analytical and reconciliation skills



About The Global Business Services



A dynamic offshore hub based in the Philippines, serving as a vital extension of its parent organization’s operations. As an internal support center, it delivers high-impact services across multiple departments, including technology, compliance, finance, and operations, supporting various lines of business.



Apply here: 



Hiring Until: 03/30/2026

title: Real Estate Acquisitions Manager Wanted! $5 - $7 / hr + 3% Commission on Closed Deals!
description:
Read until the end to know how to apply. Only candidates that follow this will be considered. 



About the Opportunity:

We’re looking for a high-performing virtual acquisitions specialist to help us close off-market real estate deals. This is a sales-focused role — you’ll be speaking directly with motivated homeowners in the U.S., building rapport, negotiating offers, and helping lock up purchase contracts.



If you’ve worked in real estate cold calling, inbound seller qualification, or direct sales (especially in real estate wholesaling, solar, or insurance), you’ll love this opportunity.



No cold calling or cold texted needed! We’ll provide warm leads, full training, and systems. You bring the closing skills, confidence, and hunger to win. 



What You’ll Do:

- Call warm leads daily, text leads daily, and consistently following up.

- Build rapport quickly and uncover motivation, timeline, and asking price.

- Follow up with sellers via phone calls and texting.

- Make offers, negotiate price and terms, etc.

- Book appointments, submit contracts, and get contracts signed. 

- Update lead statuses and detailed notes in CRM (GoHighLevel)



You’re a Good Fit If You:

- Have 2+ years of real estate cold calling, inbound sales, or acquisitions experience

- Speak excellent English with a confident, friendly tone, and no Filipino accent. 

- Know how to handle objections like “What’s your offer?” or “I need more time”, etc.

- Are confident working with KPIs, performance targets, and being held accountable. 

- Are extremely reliable and consistent with your hours and CRM updates

- Can work U.S. hours (Eastern Standard Time) — ideally during the afternoons and evenings



Are comfortable using tools like:

- GoHighLevel or Podio/REI Reply/CRM equivalents

- Ring Central

- Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Drive, google meet)



Compensation:

- Hourly rate: $5–$7/hour based on experience. If you have experience in Real Estate Wholesaling Acquisitions we can pay you $7 per hour!

- Performance bonus: 3% of total profits per closed deal you helped bring in. This means we can pay $100 - $750 per closed deal depending on the profit margin. 

- Join a fast-growing real estate wholesaling business



Monthly KPI reviews and potential raise based on performance!



If you’re looking for a flexible, rewarding opportunity to grow with a company that values your work, apply now! Let’s close some deals together!



How to Apply (Follow These Instructions Exactly):

-
 your resume and a short paragraph about your sales experience and why you’re interested in this role to: BuyingINDY at Gmail



- Use the subject line:

Acquisitions VA Application – [Your Name]

title: Scheduling in-home appointments (Warm leads)
description:
We are seeking a dedicated, disciplined, and high-performing Appointment Setter to join our team.



This role is not for everyone — it requires resilience, precision, and the ability to thrive under pressure. If you are serious about building a long-term role with a growing healthcare company, we want to hear from you.



The Role

You will be calling warm leads — patients who have been referred by their Family Doctor — to schedule in-home appointments with our health professionals. Accuracy, professionalism, and empathy are essential.



What We’re Looking For

- Minimum 3 years recent outbound calling or telemarketing experience

- Proven ability to consistently make 160+ manual dial calls daily

- Clear and friendly spoken English, with confidence on the phone

- Experience working with companies in Australia, UK, USA, or Canada

- Strong listening skills and ability to follow instructions and systems precisely

- Strong preference for candidates with prior experience scheduling in-home visits (healthcare, insurance, or home services)





Requirements (must be submitted to be considered):

1) Link to your resume (Google Drive/Dropbox – public access enabled)

2) Voice recording of the following script:





"Hi John, my name is (insert name). I’m just calling from a Pharmacy — we’ve received a referral from your GP Dr Daniel Smith, fro
lbourne Medical Centre, about a pharmacist coming to your home to chat with you about your medications. Does this ring a bell? Excellent, I’m just calling today to organise a time for the appointment. Our pharmacist is coming to your area next Thursday — would 9:45am work for you?"

title: Looking to hire ROCKSTAR in SEO and Light Web Support
description:
I’m a growing entrepreneur. My business provides web services (like SEO/GEO, Social Media Management, Website design and redesign, Google Ads, Website Maintenance, etc) to small business owners in the United States. I’m looking for someone who will work on SEO for my clients and also do some maintenance and support for client websites on platforms like Wordpress, Oasis/Duda, GoDaddy, Wix, etc.



There are only two real requirements for this position: strong spoken & written English, and at least 1 year prior working experience working on and improving SEO (we will train you on the specifics of our clients and everything else).



This posting is for a paid trial run position. We will be selecting 2 - 3 candidates to do a paid trial run with. 



Right now I’m looking for someone part-time but am hoping to grow to full-time work. You will be expected to work 10-20 hours per week. In the beginning you will need to work Arizona USA daytime hours but with success and showing you have learned the processes, you can earn the freedom to work flexible hours. When applying for the position please be sure to include this keyword in the subject SEOG0206.



Position Overview:

Your role will be performing full SEO/GEO actions for our clients that pay for the service (onpage, offpage, backlink, keyword research, etc...). You will be responsible for the growth of their rankings and ensure all strategies are implemented to help them grow. You may also be assigned additional work items, for example: website maintenance & support items like updating Wordpress plugins, pulling and formatting reports from Google Analytics, and/or making updates to client Google Business Profiles.

Apply via
: 



WHO WE ARE

We’re not just running ads, we’re running a movement. Across 7+ high-growth businesses in real estate, compliance, digital, automation, and lifestyle brands, we’re building scalable marketing machines that drive performance, not just presence.



We're lean, fast, and outcome-obsessed. If you're looking for fluff, swipe left. If you're ready to leave a legacy in the performance marketing world, we’re your people.



WHO WE’RE LOOKING FOR

You’re not a media buyer. You’re a conversion assassin.

You live in Meta Ads Manager like it’s your home office, and results are your love language.

You're a hybrid: a strategist, a creative, and a technician. You dream in ROAS, CTR, CPL, and LTV. You're not just here to run campaigns, you architect funnels that feed Empires.



You’re probably:

A funnel sniper who knows which ad will convert before it’s even live.

A creative director in disguise with an eye for thumb-stopping hooks.

A full-stack ads expert who eats tracking, retargeting, and attribution for breakfast.

A high-output operator who thrives in high-trust, high-performance environments.



REAL TASKS YOU’LL BE DOING

Building and scaling performance-driven Meta campaigns across multiple brands (real estate, digital products, services, SaaS).

Writing copy and creative briefs that hook, convert, and scale.

Testing ad angles, lead magnets, videos, UGC, and static creatives at speed.

Optimising based on cold-hard data. No vibes-based decisions here.

Collaborating with content teams, funnel builders, and leadership on strategy and vision.

Building reporting dashboards that actually help make smart decisions.

Creating growth loops between Meta, GHL, websites,
, and AI outreach.



REQUIRED SKILLS & EXPERIENCE

3+ years running $20k+/month in ad spend profitably.

Deep mastery of Meta Business Suite, Ads Manager, audiences, and tracking.

Strong knowledge of creative strategy (UGC, ad structures, testing methodologies).

Confidence working with performance funnels, lead capture, and multi-touch journeys.

Understanding of A/B testing and scaling principles.



BONUS: Familiar with GoHighLevel, Google Ads



WHO YOU'RE NOT

An ‘ads manager’ who just hits publish and prays.

Someone who blames the algorithm instead of testing better hooks.

A freelancer juggling 8 clients and giving 20% to each.

A click-farmer focused on vanity metrics and not business impact.



WHY YOU’LL LOVE THIS ROLE

Work directly with founders and senior operators.

Own the ad accounts and be trusted to perform - no micromanaging.

Get the satisfaction of seeing your strategy drive real business growth.

Opportunity to work across multiple verticals and create empire-wide impact.

We reward loyalty, performance, and creativity with real upside.



TO APPLY

Your best-performing campaign (what made it work?)

Your unique approach to testing and scaling Meta ads

Why you're the weapon we've been looking for

Subject: Meta Weapon – [Your Name]

Are you a seasoned technology leader with deep expertise in branding, systems, and high-quality website development? We are seeking a dynamic Chief Technology Officer (CTO) to spearhead the digital strategy, operational innovation, and systems architecture across our portfolio of five+ companies. This is your opportunity to take the lead in shaping, refining, and elevating our digital presence and systems to the next level.



Key Responsibilities:

Lead Branding & Design Efforts: Oversee and unify the branding, design, and development efforts across all five companies, ensuring a cohesive, premium, and impactful brand identity. Ensure the proper use of branding style guides and design briefs to maintain consistency in every touchpoint.



Execute High-Quality Website Development: Manage the development and optimisation of all company websites, focusing on user engagement, speed, SEO performance, and a visually compelling experience that speaks to the company’s brand values.



Marketing & Digital Strategy: Provide strategic guidance on digital marketing initiatives, helping the business dominate its market with a strong, data-driven online presence. Lead the adoption of tools, systems, and workflows that streamline operations, customer acquisition, and overall business growth, particularly focusing on Go High Level.



Systems & Workflow Innovation: Ensure that system architecture, automation, and workflows are not just functioning but thriving. Work with teams to build and enhance systems like Go High Level, workflow automation, and scalable platforms that support marketing, sales, and customer service efforts.



Team Leadership & Mentorship: Lead, manage, and mentor cross-functional teams of developers, designers, and IT professionals, guiding them toward delivering exceptional, high-quality results. Instil a detail-oriented mindset, ensuring all projects meet the highest standards.



Detail-Driven Branding Systems: Create and enforce a structure for branding systems, ensuring every piece of digital and visual content aligns with the brand’s strategic objectives and high-quality standards.



Security, Data Management & IT Governance: Oversee digital platforms to ensure robust security protocols, data management, and adherence to IT governance best practices, enabling safe, efficient operations.



What We’re Looking For:

Extensive Experience: A proven track record in branding, website development, systems implementation, and technology leadership, particularly in digital strategy and execution.

Expertise in Go High Level: Deep understanding of Go High Level or similar platforms, with experience in implementing workflows and automating systems to boost marketing, sales, and customer service efforts.

Systems & Workflow Mastery: Expertise in optimising system architectures and building workflows that drive efficiency, automate tasks, and support scalable business operations.

Eye for Detail: An individual who is detail-obsessed, ensuring that every aspect of system development meets the highest standards. You must have a high bar for quality and the ability to catch small errors before they become big issues.

Innovative Problem Solver: Ability to identify bottlenecks and implement creative solutions. You should thrive in continuously improving systems, websites, and digital platforms.

Leadership & Collaboration: Strong leadership skills with the ability to drive collaboration and inspire teams. You will play a crucial role in guiding our developers, designers, and marketing professionals to their best work.

Strategic Vision: Ability to align technology, branding, and digital marketing initiatives with overall business objectives, contributing to growth, customer engagement, and market dominance.



WE'RE NOT LOOKING FOR...

Freelancers who have only built basic funnels or automations for 1-2 clients

People who need step-by-step hand-holding for every new task

Anyone who’s afraid of diving into broken tech to figure it out

People who don’t love documentation—we build to scale



What’s Next?

If you’re ready to take the reins and lead Pool Safety Solutions and our other companies into their next phase of growth, we’d love to hear from you. Please submit your CV, a cover letter detailing your experience and vision for this role, and a video explaining how you would bring the best out of our brands, systems, and workflows.

title: Meta Ads Video Editor (E-commerce) — Ad-Hoc / On-Call
description:
Role: Meta Ads Video Editor (E-commerce) — Ad-Hoc / On-Call

Type: Part-time, flexible hours

Start: ASAP



We’re an e-commerce brand running paid ads on
 & Instagram, and we’re looking for a Meta ads video editor who can both execute clean edits and come up with winning ad concepts.



This role is not just editing from briefs.

You must be comfortable:



Working from clear briefs when provided



Independently creating ad concepts using our existing content library (UGC, product clips, lifestyle footage)



What you’ll do

Editing & execution



Edit short-form Meta ads (6–45 seconds)



Strong 1–3 second hooks



Fast pacing, pattern interrupts, clean structure



On-screen captions (mobile-first, readable, Meta-safe)



Export ads in correct formats (9:16, 4:5, 1:1)



Creative & concepting



Come up with original ad concepts using our content database



Turn one idea into multiple testable variations



Propose hooks, angles, and structures for cold traffic



Improve or iterate ads based on feedback or performance



Must-have skills



Proven experience editing Meta ads for e-commerce



Strong understanding of direct-response editing (not cinematic reels)



Comfortable creating ad concepts from scratch



Can also follow briefs exactly when required



Fast turnaround and open to iteration



Bonus skills (nice to have)



UGC-style ad experience



CRO or performance mindset



Familiar with Meta ad policies



Experience with health, wellness, or physical products



Can explain why an ad might perform well



Performance bonus (important)



We offer a $25 USD bonus for winning ad concepts / creations.



This applies only to ads that:



Are your original concept (not from our brief)



Are created using our existing content library



Are launched and tested on Meta



Demonstrate strong performance relative to our benchmarks



Ads edited strictly from provided briefs are paid at the standard rate and are not eligible for the bonus.



This incentive is designed to reward creative thinking, ownership, and effort, not just execution.

title: Full Stack Developer Nee
description:
I am building an MVP of an AI-powered outreach and CRM automation platform. This is NOT a basic website. It is a working web app that connects AI, outreach tools, CRM, messaging, and scheduling in one dashboard.



I already have the feature structure and reference stack. I need a developer who can build a lean MVP first — not overengineer.



Core MVP Features Required:



User login + dashboard



AI message generation using OpenAI API



Lead import + management (simple CRM)



 sending integration (SendGrid or similar)



SMS / voice integration (Twilio)



Basic outreach automation workflows



Meeting scheduling integration (Google Calendar or Calendly)



Simple funnel / pipeline tracking



Stripe payment integration



Admin panel



Tech Preferences (flexible if justified):



Backend: Node.js or Python



Frontend: React or Next.js



Database: PostgreSQL or Firebase



Hosting: Cost-efficient option (not automatically AWS if cheaper alternative is better)









Important:



You must suggest cheaper and reliable alternatives where possible



MVP first, scale later



Clean, documented code required



Weekly progress demos required



To Apply — Answer These:



What similar SaaS or dashboard apps have you built?



What stack would you choose and why?



Estimated MVP timeline



Fixed MVP price quote



Your experience with AI + API integrations



Low-effort copy-paste applications will be ignored.

title: Building Surveyor / Construction Reporting Specialist
description:
About the Role



We are a UK-based built environment consultancy delivering property inspection and asset assessment services for residential buildings.



We are seeking a detail-oriented Building Surveyor / Construction Reporting Specialist to support our field operations by completing technical inspection reports remotely.



All site inspections, measurements, and photographs are completed in the UK. Your role will focus on accurate reporting, data entry, and quality review using pre-loaded inspection software.



This is a long-term role for someone who is methodical, reliable, and comfortable working with construction-related data.



?



Key Responsibilities

 • Complete property inspection reports using pre-loaded survey applications

 • Review and interpret site photographs, notes, and measurements

 • Accurately describe building elements, condition, and defects

 • Ensure reports meet internal quality and consistency standards

 • Make revisions following review feedback

 • Maintain accuracy across a high volume of reports



?



Required Skills & Experience

 • Background in Building Surveying, Civil Engineering, Architecture, or Construction

Solid understanding of:

 • Building elements (roofs, facades, interiors, basic services)

 • Common defects (damp, deterioration, cracking, finishes)

 • Experience with technical or inspection-based reporting

 • Strong written English and clear communication

 • High attention to detail

 • Able to work independently and meet deadlines



?



Nice to Have (Not Essential)

 • Experience supporting overseas clients (UK, AU, EU)

 • Familiarity with inspection or reporting software

 • Experience with residential buildings or housing projects

You will help our clients manage their online presence by maintaining posting schedules, updating data sheets, and collecting ideas for upcoming campaigns. Training is provided for all tools you will use.

 • No U.S. or graveyard shifts



COMPENSATION

 • Php 12,500 to 14,000 per month (around USD $215 to $245)

 • Bonus incentives for creativity, consistency, and attendance

 • Performance reviews every 30 days with opportunities for pay increases



WHY JOIN OUR TEAM

 • Step-by-step training for all social media tools

WHAT YOU WILL LEARN

HOW TO APPLY

Send us a message to receive the application form. We look forward to hearing from you!



SALARY: Php 12,500 to 14,000 per month (around USD 215 to 245) with daily incentives and bonuses for top performers

title: Virtual Assistant – Client Coordination, Phone Support & Membership Sales
description:
(Part-Time Start ? Full-Time Growth Role)

Salary

20–25 hours/week

40 hours/week

This role is designed to grow into a full-time, long-term position for the right candidate.

This role involves:

Securing appointments

Collecting credit card information

Explaining services and memberships clearly



???? C2-level English (or near-native fluency) is REQUIRED.
