title: AI GIRL | Viral Social Media Video Copy/Creation
description:
YOU MUST READ THE WHOLE JOB AND COMPLETE TASK CORRECTLY FOR ME TO REPLY



Job Description — AI Viral Reel Copy / Generation (Part-Time)



I’m hiring a highly switched-on Virtual Assistant to help grow and scale AI-based social media accounts (AI girls) into real audiences and profitable private platforms.



This role is not basic editing and not casual work.



Your job is to understand why short-form content goes viral, translate those patterns into AI-generated reels using photos, and write copy that maximizes retention and conversions.



You’ll be working directly with me and my systems.



What you’ll be doing



Analyzing viral Instagram/TikTok reels to identify hooks, pacing, emotional triggers, and structure



Translating viral ideas into AI-ready shot concepts using still images



Writing scroll-stopping hooks, captions, and CTAs that fit a defined AI persona



Assisting with AI reel creation workflows (training and software provided)



Improving realism, retention, and believability of AI-generated content



Following a daily production schedule with consistency



What this role is (and is NOT)



This role IS:



Creative



Analytical



Pattern-based



Performance-driven



This role is NOT:



Heavy manual video editing



Guesswork



Inconsistent or casual work



Requirements (read carefully)



Available 1–2 hours per day, 7 days a week MINIMUM

No missed days — consistency matters



Strong understanding of short-form viral content



Ability to think in beats, 
nts, and attention



Comfortable learning and working with AI tools



Clear written communication



Willing to be tested before hiring



???? REQUIRED APPLICATION FILTER (IMPORTANT)



If you do not follow this exactly, your application will be ignored.



Step 1 — Start your message EXACTLY like this:



Attention beats editing.



(Yes — exactly like that, including the full stop.)



Step 2 — Answer this (bullet points only):



What makes someone stop scrolling in the first 2 seconds of a reel?



Rules:



Write 3 bullet points only



Each bullet must be one sentence



Do not mention tools, apps, or software



Focus on psychology, emotion, or timing



Step 3 — End your message with this exact sentence:



I can commit to 1–2 hours per day, 7 days a week.



Performance & rewards



You will be rewarded for viral performance



More hours and responsibility unlock as you prove value



Missed days, low-quality work, or sloppy execution = hours deducted



High performers grow quickly in this role



How to apply



Complete the application filter above.

Only candidates who pass will receive the next skills tests.



If you’re disciplined, creative, and serious about building something that scales — apply.

title: Growth Lead & Member Success Associate
description:
Summary

We are seeking a motivated Growth Lead & Member Success Associate to drive engagement and growth in our member community. The ideal candidate will have a passion for helping others succeed, a proven track record in enhancing member experiences and experience in lead generation. Responsibilities include developing growth strategies, onboarding new members, and providing support to ensure member satisfaction.



This role is ideal for someone who:

- Thrives on building and optimizing marketing systems that generate consistent, qualified leads

- Uses data to drive decisions and loves testing, measuring, and iterating

- Sees member success as the ultimate growth strategy

- Brings both strategic marketing thinking and hands-on execution excellence



Job description:



About Us



Spring Three is a boutique business consultancy helping boutique fitness studio owners build profitable, sustainable businesses. Through our flagship program and The Pilates Business Podcast, we provide systematic frameworks that support studio owners as they grow their business.



The Role



We're seeking a Growth Lead & Member Success Associate who excels at building scalable marketing systems while maintaining the human touch that defines our brand. You'll be the architect of Spring Three's visibility engine—driving lead generation, optimizing funnels, and expanding our reach across multiple channels—while ensuring every member feels supported and valued.



This role is ideal for someone who:



Thrives on building and optimizing marketing systems that generate consistent, qualified leads

Uses data to drive decisions and loves testing, measuring, and iterating

Sees member success as the ultimate growth strategy

Brings both strategic marketing thinking and hands-on execution excellence





Key Responsibilities



Support our evergreen funnels, lead magnets, and visibility initiatives across YouTube, podcast, social, and
 channels

Assist with launches, webinars, partner collaborations, and promotional campaigns from planning through execution

Track and report on key performance metrics related to member success, funnels, and visibility efforts

Improve systems and workflows to reduce manual work and enhance member experience

Serve as the primary point of contact for our program members, providing warm, timely, and strategic support across
, Slack, and community platforms

Conduct regular member check-in and discovery calls to guide progress, address challenges, and support retention

Maintain deep knowledge of all our offers, resources, and pathways to confidently direct members

Manage and coordinate program delivery, ensuring monthly resources and communications are delivered on time

Own and moderate private communities to foster engagement, clarity, and connection





Required Qualifications



3-5 years in growth marketing, digital marketing, funnel optimization, or demand generation

Proven track record building and scaling lead generation systems and marketing funnels

Experience with Kajabi, Google Analytics, Meta Ads, Canva, ManyChat (or similar platforms)

Strong copywriting skills with ability to create compelling marketing content

Experience with content repurposing, multi-channel distribution, and SEO strategies

Familiarity with podcast production, webinar platforms, and launch coordination

Customer success or community management experience preferred

Boutique fitness or online education industry experience strongly preferred

Has a “let’s figure this out” attitude





Benefits:



We’re a remote-first company

Flexible schedule

Full training and ongoing support

This is an Independent Contractor role

Application Instructions:



Note: If you have a business of your own that you plan to continue to grow, please do not apply. We are hiring a professional who wants to excel in a part-time role that provides worthwhile work and leads to additional growth opportunities in the future.



Our hiring process includes interviews, references and you will be expected to lean into a paid trial or paid project. If you join our team you can expect full training, ongoing support, a highly interactive work environment and a frequent review of your role and performance.



Job Type: Part-time



Benefits:



Flexible schedule

On-the-job training





Schedule: Must be available during USA ET Business Hours

title: EXPERIENCED SHORT FORM VIDEO EDITOR | Flexi Schedule
description:
We’re hiring someone who knows how to turn long-form content into sharp, high-retention short videos for platforms like TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.



This role is for someone who understands pacing, hooks, and visual rhythm in short-form content, and knows how to edit with intention rather than just cutting clips.



—-----------------------------------------------------------------------------



READ THE ENTIRE JOB LISTING CAREFULLY. The final step of the hiring process will require the candidate to provide at least 1 former employer/team lead reference and at least 1 character reference. These will be verified prior to extending an offer.



--- ABOUT THE TEAM ---

Want to work in a rewarding, fast-paced, start-up atmosphere? Looking for significant growth and performance bonus opportunities? Have a growth mindset, value relationships, and dedicated to getting results? Then we might be a fit!



What is it like to work with us? HEAR FROM OUR TEAM!   





Our Core Values:

1) DELIGHT THE CLIENT:  We consistently exceed expectations by anticipating needs, delivering outstanding service, and creating those “magic 
nts” where every client feels seen and heard.

2) MASTER YOUR CRAFT:  We commit to continuous learning, share our expertise openly, and tackle every challenge with precision and a deep sense of duty.

3) FOLLOW THROUGH, ALWAYS:  When we say something will happen, it does—every time. We own every task, ensuring that nothing falls through the cracks, and when mistakes occur, we learn and improve immediately.



Our core values are important and the right candidate will share our values. We are building an awesome place to work, not just cutting together videos for our real estate business.



--- ABOUT YOU ---

Do you have strong creative instincts and know how to spot 
nts that make people stop scrolling? Are you proactive, adaptable, and detail-oriented? Do you have a sharp sense of pacing, an instinct for hooks, and a clear understanding of how short-form videos need to flow to hold attention? Do you take pride in clean edits and delivering videos that feel intentional and finished? Do our core values sound like a fit for who you are?



Then keep reading to see if we're a fit!



Responsibilities:

Short-Form Editing & Story Selection

- Review long-form videos, transcripts, or raw footage to identify short-form clip opportunities

- Select 
nts that are clear, engaging, and platform-appropriate

- Edit vertical videos optimized for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts

- Create strong hooks, clean cuts, and natural pacing

- Deliver publish-ready videos that meet brand and platform standards



Captions, Visuals & Formatting

- Add on-screen captions (burned-in or SRT as required) with proper timing and readability

- Apply basic motion, zooms, punch-ins, and visual emphasis where appropriate

- Follow platform-specific formatting (aspect ratio, duration, safe margins)



Iteration & Workflow

- Implement feedback efficiently and meet agreed turnaround times

- Maintain clear file naming and folder organization

- Track edits, revisions, and delivery status as required



Requirements:

- A STABLE, HIGH-SPEED INTERNET CONNECTION, REQUIRED (at least 150mbps)

- Experience with Final Cut Pro X (or other editing software, such as Adobe After Effects and Premiere Pro) is required

- Strong preference for MacOS users

- Experience editing short-form vertical content for social platforms, required

- Strong understanding of short-form pacing, hooks, and retention

- Experience working from transcripts or long-form content, required

- Clean file organization and understanding of post-production workflow

- Portfolio of completed short-form video projects, required

- General understanding of brand, content marketing, YouTube, etc, required

- GREAT interpersonal and communication skills, required

- Ability to self-start, work on a tight schedule, and manage multiple project deadlines, required

- Ability to follow directions and a LOVE of completing lots of projects according to consistent specifications, required

- Growth mindset, required



--- APPLICATION & RECRUITMENT PROCESS ---

STEP 1:

Fill out the application form through the link below and write "green kangaroo" in the Additional Comments field.


 



STEP 2:

Qualified candidates may be invited to participate in two PAID test projects, $10-20 USD for each test project estimated to be 2-3hrs of work for each (a total of $40 USD!).



STEP 3:

Candidates who advance through the test project rounds will be invited to an interview.



STEP 4:

Before extending a trial offer, we will conduct a CHARACTER REFERENCE CHECK for the final candidate(s). CONDUCTING A REFERENCE CHECK will be the last step in the hiring process.



STEP 5:

Upon receiving a trial offer, you will be onboarded as a Video Editor with a 90-day PAID trial period. During this period, we expect you to demonstrate your video editing expertise, meet project deadlines, be a team player, and excel at what you do. A successful trial will lead to a permanent offer to join the team.

Our hiring process includes interviews, references and you will be expected to lean into a paid trial or paid project. If you join our team you can expect full training, ongoing support, a highly interactive work environment and a frequent review of your role and performance.



Job Type: Part-time



Benefits:



Flexible schedule

On-the-job training





Schedule: Must be available during USA ET Business Hours

title: Growth & Outreach Manager (Content & Marketing)
description:
Role Overview



We’re looking for a self-motivated Growth & Outreach Manager to drive new client acquisition, build relationships, and fuel the growth engine of our content and marketing studio.



This role is ideal for someone who enjoys starting conversations, building trust, and turning relationships into opportunities. You’ll be responsible for lead generation, outreach, follow-ups, and helping move prospects into our content,
, and retainer funnels.



This is not a passive role. Success comes from initiative, consistency, and communication, not waiting for instructions.



What You’ll Do (Daily & Weekly Responsibilities)



Lead Generation & Outreach

- Research and identify 5–10 qualified businesses per day that align with our services

- Initiate conversations via DMs,
, comments, and networking platforms

- Personalize outreach based on each business’s needs and brand

- Maintain and update a lead tracker or CRM daily



Relationship Building & Follow-Up

- Nurture conversations with warm leads and past prospects

- Follow up on open conversations and proposals

- Build trust through helpful insights, content suggestions, and value-first messaging

- Help move leads into discovery calls,
 funnels, or retainer discussions



Funnel & List Growth

- Collect and organize new contacts into our
/CRM system

- Assist in distributing lead magnets, free audits, or content resources

- Track where leads come from and what messaging performs best



Collaboration & Reporting

- Share weekly insights on what outreach angles are working

- Flag high-potential leads for deeper conversations or pitches

- Collaborate with the content team to align messaging with growth goals



Who Will Succeed in This Role



This role is perfect for someone who is:

- Comfortable starting conversations (even with strangers)

- Consistent and organized — follows up without being reminded

- Curious about businesses and brands — asks smart questions

- Resilient — doesn’t take “no” personally

- Growth-minded — focused on results, not just activity



You don’t need to be “salesy.” You do need to be confident, proactive, and thoughtful.



Skills & Experience (Preferred, Not Required)



- Experience with outreach, sales, partnerships, or community management

- Familiarity with social platforms (Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok,
)

- Comfortable using spreadsheets, Notion, or CRM tools

- Strong written communication skills

- Interest in content, branding, marketing, or creative businesses



How Success Is Measured

- Number of meaningful conversations started weekly

- Quality and consistency of follow-ups

- New leads added to the funnel

- Discovery calls or warm handoffs to the sales/content team

- Contribution to retainer package conversions



Why This Role Matters

Every brand deserves help growing — and this role is the front door to that growth.

You’re not just booking calls — you’re opening doors, starting relationships, and helping businesses take the next step forward.

title: Content Growth Editor (Video & Photo) – Marketing-Driven Storyteller
description:
Role Description



We’re a small but ambitious content and marketing business with a simple belief: every business deserves the help they need to grow.

By March 2026, our mission is to:



- Serve 20 new clients

- Sell 5 retainer packages

- Collect 500 new
/lead contacts into our funnel



This role is not about “just editing.”

It’s about using video and photo content as a growth engine.



What You’ll Actually Do

- Edit short-form and long-form video content optimized for Instagram, TikTok, YouTube,
, and landing pages

- Edit and enhance photo content for social, websites, and marketing campaigns

- Turn raw content into clear brand stories that attract, educate, and convert

- Understand why content is being made—not just how it looks

Help shape content that:

- Builds trust

- Drives inquiries

- Collects
s/leads

- Supports retainer sales



How You’ll Succeed in This Role

- You think beyond aesthetics and ask: “What is this supposed to do?”

- You understand that content = attention ? trust ? action

- You’re comfortable collaborating with strategists, clients, and creatives

- You can work fast without losing intention

- You take ownership of outcomes, not just deliverables



This Is NOT:

- A passive “wait for instructions” editing job

- A role for someone who only cares about visuals and not results

- A job for someone who dislikes feedback, iteration, or growth



The 3 Key Characteristics That Matter Most



1. Growth-Minded Creative

They understand that content exists to solve business problems, not just look cool.

They care about:

- Engagement

- Conversions

- Retention

- Results



They ask:

“How does this help the client grow?”



2. Ownership Mentality

They treat the mission like it’s their own business.

This person:

- Takes initiative

- Flags opportunities

- Suggests improvements

- Thinks ahead instead of waiting



They don’t say:

- “That’s not my job.”

They say:

- “Here’s how we can make this better.”



3. Adaptable + Curious

Marketing changes fast—and small businesses move even faster.

This person:

- Learns platforms quickly

- Adjusts to new formats, trends, and tools

- Isn’t married to one style or method

- Wants to get better every month



Curiosity > ego. Always.

title: Etsy Shop Manager: Skilled in Customer Service, Adobe Illustrator, and SEO
description:
We are a high-end Etsy brand that creates custom heirloom keepsakes. We are looking for an Etsy Shop Manager who will begin with order processing on Etsy/Printify, customer service, Adobe Illustrator formatting, and grow into listing optimization, SEO, and marketing support as they become familiar with our systems and brand. You will be trained on our systems, but we are looking for someone who can think independently, follow detailed processes, and take ownership of their responsibilities.

This is a long-term position for someone who wants to grow with a brand, not just complete tasks.



This role will begin at approximately 10-15 hours per week with opportunity to grow as responsibilities increase.



This position is not for you if:

You have only done basic admin or VA work and are unfamiliar with Etsy

You do NOT have Adobe Illustrator or experience in that platform

You are not detail-oriented

You are uncomfortable communicating with customers

You are looking for short-term work



Required:

Comfortable navigating Etsy orders, messages, and listings

Previous experience working inside an Etsy shop

Excellent written English and customer communication

Highly organized and detail-oriented

Basic to intermediate Adobe Illustrator skills (you will use this to process standard designs)

POD platforms such as Printify, Printful, Printed Mint, etc.

Canva Pro and mockups, and comfort working between Canva and Adobe Illustrator

3+ years of Instagram and
 experience



Bonus skills you will grow into over time: 

Etsy SEO strategy and tools such as Vela, Everbee, eRank, or Alura

Listing optimization and keyword research



Primary Role 1 – Etsy Operations and Customer Service (starting focus)

Process orders from the “New” folder

Send order confirmation messages using saved replies and edit name, item, and ship date

Organize orders into correct folders

Send photo follow-up messages

Send IG sneak peek message once design is ready

Send production and shipping confirmation message

Respond to 5-star reviews appropriately and flag any reviews under 4 stars

Use Adobe Illustrator to process standard customer designs once trained



Primary Role 2 – Marketing / Social Media Support

Etsy Marketing Support

Monitor rolling 24-hour sales and ensure they are scheduled a month in advance

Update shop announcement as needed

Instagram

Save high-quality review photos

Edit review photos

Create carousel posts of custom orders

Post sneak peeks to stories

Edit behind-the-scenes reels from provided content

Pinterest

Pin Etsy photos to Pinterest


Post products in relevant
 groups

Respond to comments with links



Primary Role 3 – Listing and Shop Support (as you grow)

Assist with optimizing Etsy listings

Keyword research and SEO support



How to Apply:



Use the subject line: Your New Etsy Ninja!!!



In your
, include the following in this exact order:

1. Introduce yourself and describe your direct experience working inside an Etsy shop.

2. Answer the following questions in detail:



A. Describe your process for automating or streamlining Etsy-related tasks such as order processing and messages.

B. Please write how you would respond to this customer review as the shop owner. “I was excited to receive this blanket because the design is beautiful and the personalization looked perfect in the preview. When it arrived, the names and date were correct, but the blanket itself feels thinner than I expected for the price. It’s not as soft as I imagined either. It looks more like a decorative throw than something cozy to use. Shipping was also a little slower than I thought it would be. Overall it’s nice, but I don’t feel like it was worth what I paid.”

C. What Etsy tools have you personally used? Explain what you use each one for in your workflow.

D. Please include samples of your Adobe Illustrator work or a portfolio link and describe your experience using Adobe Illustrator.

E. Why are you interested in working with a high-end custom keepsake brand long-term?



Applications that do not follow these instructions or skip any step will not be considered. This role will begin with customer service, shop support, and basic Adobe Illustrator design formatting. As trust builds, you will grow into marketing, listing optimization, and SEO. We are looking for someone long-term who wants to grow with the company.



Because this role involves access to proprietary systems, design templates, workflows, and our Etsy shop, shortlisted candidates will be required to sign a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) before receiving the shop link or any internal materials. Respect for confidentiality and brand protection is essential for this role.

title: Google Ads and Social Media Ads Expert
description:
E-LAW PROFESSIONAL CORPORATION is a rapidly growing Canadian law firm. We are seeking to hire a Social Media Expert who will be responsible for the creation and management of all social media content coming out of the law practice for publication on

Please reply with a resume in .pdf format and cover letter in .pdf format.



Thank you.

title: Experienced Developer | Contract then full/part time
description:
About the Role

------------------------------------------------



Soapbox Design is looking for a sharp, reliable Developer who loves building beautiful, fast, and functional websites and who’s excited to grow with a creative studio that values clean structure, thoughtful design, and long-term client relationships.



This is a development-first role, ideal for someone who thrives on translating layouts into polished builds using WordPress and Shopify, with an eye for UX and front-end detail. Bonus points if you’ve worked closely alongside designers or bring strong interface sensibility.



Curiosity about AI, automation, and smart systems is expected, balanced with respect for structure, scope, and commercial outcomes.



Remote – AEST Hours 



Role Scope

------------------------------------------------



- Build fully responsive websites in WordPress (Elementor, ACF, custom themes)

- Develop custom layouts and sections in Shopify

- Translate Figma designs into live, mobile-first builds

- Implement opt-ins, forms, and automation tools such as Klaviyo and Go High Level

- Optimise websites for speed, SEO, accessibility, and performance

- Assist with QA, troubleshooting, and updates across client sites

- Collaborate with designers, marketers, and project managers to keep projects moving smoothly

- Provide clear handover notes at the completion of tasks or phases



Tools and Platforms

------------------------------------------------



Core Stack:

- WordPress (custom themes, Elementor, ACF)

- Shopify (theme customisation, templates, Liquid)

- Front-end: HTML, CSS, JavaScript

- Back-end: PHP, particularly for WordPress

- SEO and performance tools such as GTmetrix and PageSpeed Insights



Bonus Tools and Platforms

Awareness and familiarity are valued. Final tool selection follows Soapbox standards and project requirements.



- Klaviyo for template editing, form integration, and flows

- Go High Level for funnels, opt-ins, and automation

- Cursor, GitHub Copilot, Replit for AI-assisted development

- Framer or Webflow for rapid prototyping when approved

- ChatGPT, Claude, or Gemini for documentation, debugging, and workflow support

- LottieFiles, Vercel, Netlify as part of a modern web delivery stack



What Will Set You Up for Success 

------------------------------------------------

Essentials



Technical:

- Strong front-end skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

- Solid PHP experience, especially within WordPress environments

- Theme and template development across WordPress and Shopify

- Experience integrating Klaviyo or Go High Level into marketing websites

- Strong understanding of mobile-first, accessible, responsive builds



Bonus: 

Practical use of AI tools in development workflows

Comfortable talking to clients or other tech teams if required.



Experience

------------------------------------------
+ years delivering production websites for paying clients (agency, freelance, or in-house)

- Proven experience building and maintaining high-quality websites

- Comfortable collaborating with designers on brand-led projects

- Understanding of lead generation, landing pages, and
 platform integrations



Essential Traits

------------------------------------------------

- Calm, consistent.

- Proactive communicator with strong accountability

- Solution-focused with client and commercial context in mind

- Detail-oriented with a strong eye for UX and performance

- Follows systems and escalates issues early when required

- Comfortable working remotely with asynchronous collaboration

- Asks clarifying questions early and documents handover clearly

- Curious, adaptable, and systems-aware



Strong Bonus Skills

------------------------------------------------

Klaviyo setup, template editing, and form integration

Go High Level automation and funnel experience

Light design or layout sensibility

Understanding of
 marketing and customer journey logic

Experience documenting or improving development workflows



Work Setup

------------------------------------------------

Fully remote, AEST-aligned hours

Start at 10–20 hours per week during probation

Opportunity to grow into part-time or full-time role.



All work tracked in ClickUp with time logged to task IDs

Collaboration via
, Teams, and shared folders



Soapbox Developer Task

------------------------------------------------

Brief Title



Premium Skincare Landing Page Build – WordPress or Shopify (Mobile-First)



Scenario



Soapbox has taken on a premium skincare brand launching a new brightening serum formulated using marine biotechnology. The product is high-end, priced at $120, and designed for women aged 35–55 seeking firmer, more radiant skin.



You will receive a basic Figma wireframe showing structure only, along with placeholder copy. Your task is to build a clean, responsive, mobile-first landing page that feels luxurious, trustworthy, and science-backed, and is optimised for conversion and opt-in.



You may use WordPress (Elementor plus ACF) or Shopify (Dawn theme or similar), depending on your strengths.



Task



Build a mobile-first landing page that includes:

Hero section with headline, subheadline, CTA button, and image

Short intro explaining the benefits of marine-derived skincare

Three to five clearly listed product benefits


 opt-in form such as “Join the waitlist for exclusive early access”

Placeholder for a 30–60 second product video embed

Testimonial or quote section to build trust

Optional placeholder branding, colours, or typography reflecting a premium tone



Deliverables



Provide:

A Loom video, maximum 10 minutes, covering:

Your development environment and tool choices

Your process from wireframe to live preview

How you structured responsiveness and performance

How the build could scale into a campaign or product page

Any assumptions or challenges you identified



A preview link or screen recording of the working page

Access to code or theme files via GitHub, zip, or sandbox

Screenshots of desktop and mobile layouts



Bonus Questions



Answer briefly via Loom or text:

What AI tools did you use or consider for this build?

What additional brief details would you request before starting a real Soapbox project?

If you had four more hours, what would you polish or extend?

Have you implemented Klaviyo or Go High Level integrations before? How would that apply here?



Notes



This task is designed to show how you think, build, and communicate

We are looking for a clean, modular, professional result, not perfection

Reusing components or starter kits is encouraged

Submit within two to three days unless otherwise agreed

title: Virtual Assistant – Video Editor, Content Creator & Graphic Designer (Part-Time, Remote)
description:

 content

title: Account & Operations Manager (Remote)
description:
Mission

To be the backbone of the business by keeping clients organized, projects on track, and internal systems running smoothly. This role ensures nothing falls through the cracks—from onboarding to delivery—while protecting scope, timelines, and client satisfaction.



Key Responsibilities

- Client Onboarding & Setup

- Manage new client onboarding from start to finish, including contracts, invoices, intake forms, and kickoff calls

- Ensure all client details, expectations, and deliverables are clearly documented from day one

- Create and organize client folders, project boards, and communication channels



Project & Workflow Management

- Oversee timelines, milestones, and deliverables across multiple client projects

- Track internal tasks and assign work to team members as needed

- Monitor progress daily to ensure projects stay on schedule and within scope

- Flag risks, bottlenecks, or delays early and propose solutions



Client Communication & Account Management

- Serve as the primary point of contact for client communication

- Provide regular updates, manage expectations, and handle day-to-day requests

- Maintain a calm, professional presence when addressing questions or concerns

- Escalate issues when necessary while keeping solutions-focused



Systems & Documentation

- Maintain and update the CRM with accurate client data and project status

- Manage
 funnels, client notes, SOPs, and internal documentation

- Improve and document workflows to increase efficiency and consistency

- Ensure all processes are repeatable, clear, and easy to follow



Retention & Growth Support

- Support client retention by ensuring a smooth, reliable experience

- Identify upsell or expansion opportunities based on client needs and usage

- Help maintain long-term client relationships through strong organization and follow-through



Success Metrics

- High client retention and satisfaction rates

- Consistent on-time project delivery

- Smooth, professional onboarding experience for every new client

- Improved internal workflow efficiency and reduced operational friction



Required Traits & Skills

- Extremely organized with strong attention to detail

- Calm and solutions-oriented under pressure

- Clear, confident written and verbal communicator

- Process-driven thinker who enjoys building systems

- Proactive, reliable, and comfortable managing multiple priorities

- Experience with project management tools, CRMs, and remote communication platforms is a plus

title: Executive Marketing Assistant (Remote)
description:
Location: Remote

Type: Part-Time to Full-Time (Growth Role)

Industry: Content Marketing | Real Estate | Construction | Architecture

Reports to: Founder / Creative Director



?



Role Overview



We are a high-touch marketing agency serving real estate, construction, and development brands. This is not a creative role. This is an operations, coordination, and execution role.



The Executive Marketing Assistant acts as the front office and systems backbone of client marketing operations—managing content requests, coordinating editors, handling scheduling, maintaining CRM data, and serving as the first line of communication for clients.



This role requires clear, fluent English. You will be communicating directly with clients, vendors, and internal team members. If your spoken or written English is not professional, clear, and easy to understand, this role will not be a fit.



If you are detail-oriented, tech-competent, responsive, and comfortable managing structured workflows remotely, this role will suit you. If you need constant hand-holding or dislike systems, it will not.



?



Core Responsibilities



Content Operations & Coordination

 • Send and manage content requests to video editors and designers on behalf of the agency and clients

 • Track content through internal production pipelines (request ? draft ? revision ? final)

 • Collect all final drafts and submit them for executive review before publishing

 • Maintain clear naming conventions, folders, and version control



Content Scheduling & Publishing

 • Schedule approved content to client content calendars across platforms (primarily Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, LinkedIn)

 • Ensure correct captions, hashtags, tags, and posting times are applied

 • Confirm posts publish correctly and flag any issues immediately



CRM & Data Management

 • Learn and operate the agency CRM (GoHighLevel / Notion / similar systems)

 • Maintain accurate client records, content logs, and task statuses

 • Track deliverables against client scopes to ensure nothing slips



Client Communication (Front Office)

 • Act as first point of contact for client questions related to content, scheduling, or status

 • Communicate clearly and professionally in spoken and written English

 • Relay client requests accurately into internal systems

 • Escalate only what requires executive decision-making



Internal Communication

 • Communicate daily via Slack and text message

 • Stay responsive during agreed working hours

 • Provide status updates without being asked



?



Required Qualifications

 • Fluent, clear English (spoken and written) — required

 • Strong willingness and ability to learn CRMs and structured systems

 • Comfortable with remote work and async communication

 • Extremely detail-oriented and organized

 • Able to manage multiple clients and deadlines simultaneously

 • Professional, reliable, and calm under pressure



This role requires follow-through, precision, and communication clarity.



?



Technical & Equipment Requirements (Non-Negotiable)

 • Reliable high-speed internet (must provide speed test screenshot)

 • Laptop capable of handling multiple browser-based tools

 • Consistent access to text messaging and Slack

 • Slack access and daily availability



?



Preferred (But Not Required)

 • Experience with CRMs (GoHighLevel,HubSpot, Notion, ClickUp, Airtable, etc.)

 • Experience working with marketing agencies or content teams

 • Familiarity with social media scheduling tools (Metricool, Later, Hootsuite, etc.)

 • Experience supporting executives or founders



?



What This Role Is Not

 • Not an influencer role

 • Not a design or video editing role

 • Not a passive admin job



This is an execution role inside a fast-moving agency. You will be trusted with real responsibility.



?



Growth Opportunity



As the agency scales, this role can expand into:

 • Operations Manager

 • Client Success Lead

 • Head of Content Operations



High performers will be rewarded with increased responsibility and compensation.

title: Full-Time Sales Assistant
description:
Company: Higher Results Education Inc.

Location: Remote (Philippines)

Work Schedule: Monday to Saturday, 3:00 AM – 1:00 PM (Philippine Time)



Company Overview

Higher Results Education Inc. is a Canada-based education consulting company that connects students with colleges to help them access the best educational opportunities. As we continue to expand our operations in the Philippines, we are looking for dependable, driven, and skilled professionals to join our growing remote team on a long-term, full-time basis.

Our goal is to deliver outstanding student support while maintaining strong relationships with clients and partners. This role is ideal for individuals with sales experience, particularly those familiar with GoHighLevel (GHL), who excel in fast-paced, results-oriented environments.



Position Overview

We are hiring Full-Time Sales Assistants responsible for reaching out to existing clients, confirming potential referrals, and supporting the overall sales process.



Key Responsibilities

Make outbound calls to clients using provided scripts

Confirm whether clients know individuals who may benefit from Higher Results Education

Identify and qualify potential referrals during calls

Accurately record and update all client interactions in GoHighLevel (GHL)

Ensure proper follow-up on leads and referrals

Coordinate closely with the sales and management teams to improve workflows and lead tracking

Maintain professionalism and excellent customer service in every interaction

Meet or exceed referral and performance targets



Performance-Based Incentives

Earn bonuses based on the number of successful referrals who enroll with Higher Results Education

High-performing assistants may be considered for additional responsibilities and career advancement opportunities



Qualifications & Requirements

Proven sales experience (telemarketing, lead generation, or related roles preferred)

Hands-on experience with GoHighLevel (GHL) is highly preferred

Strong English communication skills, both verbal and written

Ability to work independently, manage time effectively, and meet deadlines

High attention to detail, especially in data entry and lead management

Self-motivated, proactive, and goal-driven mindset

Reliable internet connection and a quiet, professional workspace



Skills & Competencies

Excellent interpersonal and relationship-building skills

Comfortable using CRM systems and following structured workflows

Resilient and positive when handling rejection

Detail-oriented with accurate tracking of leads and referrals

Able to follow scripts while keeping conversations natural and engaging



Why Join Higher Results Education?

Fully remote work setup based in the Philippines

Performance-based incentives in addition to commission

Opportunity to contribute to a company making a positive impact in education

Long-term career growth within a supportive and professional international team



How to Apply

Please
 the following to 

A brief summary of your sales experience

Details of your experience with GoHighLevel (GHL) or other CRM platforms

Your updated resume or CV

A short statement explaining your interest in the role and why you’re a strong fit

Note: This position is intended for candidates committed to long-term, full-time remote work who possess relevant sales and CRM experience. Only qualified applicants will be considered.

title: META ADS EXPERT (Facebook/Instagram) — Own One Core Campaign (High-Ticket Service) — 100,
description:
We’re hiring a highly skilled Meta Ads operator to take ownership of one primary
/Instagram campaign for a high-ticket online services business.



This is not a beginner role.

The campaign is live and generating data — your job is to optimize, stabilize, and scale it into a predictable lead engine.



Compensation (Commission-Only)



This role is commission-based only.

Because demand is extremely high and the service is high-ticket, strong operators typically treat this like near-guaranteed monthly income once performance stabilizes.



If you can deliver consistently, 100,
,000 + PHP/month is realistic.

Audit existing setup and diagnose what’s holding performance back



Improve structure, audiences, budgets, and scaling control



Lead quality focus (not just cheap leads)

Set creative direction (we have editors/designers — you lead angles, hooks, briefs, and testing)



Monitor daily, optimize weekly, communicate clearly

You only know how to launch ads, not optimize/scale



You can’t diagnose issues with a clear process



You disappear or don’t communicate



Qualifying Questions (Required)

How many Meta Ads accounts have you managed end-to-end?



What’s your strongest skill in Meta Ads?



One campaign you improved — what was wrong and what did you change?



Your exact process to diagnose poor performance?



Are you comfortable with commission-only compensation?

title: Part-Time Sales & Client Support Virtual Assistant
description:
We’re The Haus Keepers, a fast-growing home cleaning concierge company based in Colorado, USA. We’re looking for a Part-Time Sales & Client Support Virtual Assistant to help us grow.



In this role, you’ll support our lead sales VA by handling incoming leads, following up with warm prospects, and closing sales, as well as assisting with client follow-ups and weekend inquiries. You’ll play a key role in making sure every lead and client gets a fast, warm, and professional response and that no opportunities are missed.



This role is perfect for someone who is:



*Confident in sales conversations

* Warm and empathetic with clients

* Organized and proactive

* Excited to grow with a company that values both sales results and client experience



Responsibilities



* Respond quickly to incoming leads via phone, chat, and text.

* Follow up with warm leads and guide them toward booking services.

* Confidently handle basic objections (pricing, scheduling, urgency).

* Follow up with clients after cleanings to check satisfaction and encourage repeat bookings.

* Cover after-hours and weekend inquiries so nothing slips.

* Support the lead VA by taking on overflow tasks.

* Keep detailed notes in GoHighLevel CRM.



Requirements



* Excellent written and spoken English (clear, friendly, and confident).

* Sales or customer service experience required (phone or chat sales a plus).

* Comfortable guiding clients through booking and handling objections.

* Strong organizational and follow-up skills.

* Reliable computer, internet connection, and backup power.

* Availability to work Saturdays & Sundays 8am-5pm MST and 8am-12pm Mondays with opportunity to grow into full-time over time



Pay & Growth



Starting pay: $400/month



Paid holidays 



Long-term role with the potential to grow into full-time sales + client success as the company expands.



How to Apply



Please complete our application form here:

 



Applications without the form submission will not be reviewed.

title: Eccommerce Manager
description:
We are seeking a true business owner in a management role, not an executor waiting for direction.



About Us

We are a Canadian manufacturer established in 1990. Our brands, Plastair, DeeVa, and PlastairFyre, are built on differentiated products, strong margins, and when appropriate, utility patents or design patents. We manufacture in Canada, or source electronics overseas, then protect and position them properly.



We have a strong presence in brick and mortar retail in North America for decades. Now we are building a serious digital revenue engine. Our online presence is underdeveloped relative to our product strength, and we want fast, measurable improvement without the owner being the day to day operator.



The Role



 - This is a full time leadership role for a true owner operator. You will own digital revenue results across Amazon Seller, Shopify DTC, and additional marketplaces including Walmart, Wayfair, and digital B2B platforms such as Faire and Grainger.



- This is not a VA role, not a coordinator role, not a task manager role. Your job is to build the machine, lead people, make decisions, and remove work from ownership’s plate.



- You will manage and leverage our existing Amazon operations resource, you will rebuild our creative production function to improve speed, accuracy, and quality.



What Success Looks Like:



Within 60 to 90 days, ownership should experience a real reduction in day to day decisions, fewer errors, faster execution, clearer reporting, and visible 
ntum across listings, creative, ads, and channel expansion.



If you do not remove work from the owner’s plate, you are not a fit.



Core Responsibilities:

-Digital revenue ownership and execution cadence



-Own the digital revenue plan, priorities, and weekly execution cadence across all digital channels



-Make decisions, do not push decisions upward unless budget risk or strategy change is required



-Implement a simple weekly reporting system showing revenue, margin, conversion, TACOS, ACOS, ROAS, inventory health, and next actions



-Marketplaces and Shopify DTC



-Own Amazon Seller growth, SKU focus, pricing strategy, merchandising, promotions, and catalog health



-Own Shopify DTC fundamentals, conversion rate improvement, product page quality, offers, and traffic plans



-Launch and scale Walmart and Wayfair with correct catalog setup, content requirements, compliance, and fulfillment workflows



-Plan and execute international Amazon expansion when unit economics and operational readiness support it



-Digital B2B marketplaces



-Own digital B2B marketplace performance including platforms such as Faire and Grainger



-Ensure pricing, content, and inventory strategy align with brand positioning and avoid channel conflict



-Coordinate onboarding, catalog setup, and ongoing optimization for digital wholesale platforms



-Paid media strategy and performance



-Own paid media strategy and budget allocation across Amazon ads and Meta, plus other channels as appropriate



-You may execute ads yourself or manage a specialist, but you are accountable for outcomes



-Build repeatable testing systems for keywords, creative, offers, and landing pages, not random changes



-Creative, content, and influencer systems



-Rebuild our creative production to improve speed, accuracy, and taste



-Create a repeatable workflow for product images, video, A plus content, storefronts, and ad creative



-Build an influencer and UGC pipeline that produces usable assets and measurable performance, not vanity metrics



Team leadership and accountability



-Manage Amazon Operations Lead, inventory, listings execution, and operational hygiene



-Hire and manage the minimum team needed to win, typically 2 to 4 people across ads execution and creative production



B-uild SOPs so performance does not depend on any one person



What We Already Have:



S-trong product differentiation, IP strategy, and manufacturing capability



-Existing Amazon operations support, currently part time



-Clear need to rebuild creative production due to speed and error issues



Required Experience and Traits:



-Proven ownership of ecommerce growth and results, not just tasks



-Experience managing Amazon Seller Central and at least two of the following, Shopify DTC, Walmart, Wayfair, Faire, Grainger



-Demonstrated leadership, hiring, training, accountability, and building repeatable systems



-Strong analytical thinking, comfortable with margin math and channel tradeoffs



-High urgency, fast execution, high quality, low error tolerance



-Fluent English, able to overlap 2 to 3 hours daily with Eastern Time



-Full time commitment to one company and long term mindset



Performance Targets:



-Targets will be confirmed after your initial audit, but you should expect accountability for:



-Meaningful growth from the current Amazon baseline while protecting contribution margin



-Clean scalable paid media performance with controlled ACOS and improving TACOS over time



-Walmart and Wayfair live with correct catalog, operational workflows, and launch plan



-Clear improvement in listing quality, creative quality, and production speed



-Digital B2B marketplace launches and optimization without channel conflict



-International expansion roadmap for at least one additional Amazon region when economics support it



How to Apply:



Submit all items to be prioritized.



-Your resume



A 200 word plan for your first 90 days, specific to Plastair, DeeVa, and PlastairFyre, generic plans will be rejected



-Links to brands, stores, or campaigns you directly managed, include specific results such as revenue impact, ACOS, TACOS, ROAS, conversion, growth rate



Optional, a 2 to 3 minute Loom video introducing yourself and explaining one case study win



Screening Note



We prioritize candidates who demonstrate ownership, decision making, and evidence of removing work from founders, not candidates who list tools and tasks.

title: Video Editor (High Autonomy / Flexible Schedule) – $700/mo
description:
THE ROLE: Professional Freedom



I’m looking for a professional Video Editor who thrives on autonomy. This is a "Freedom Job" I don’t believe in micro-management or tracking your every move. You’ll have the flexibility to work at your own pace and manage your own schedule, as long as the work is exceptional and deadlines are hit.

I need a storyteller, not just a "clip cutter." You’ll be working on a mix of corporate and creative edits that require a deep understanding of pacing, rhythm, and technical workflows.

title: Acquisition Specialist (Real Estate)
description:
Acquisition Specialist (Real Estate Wholesaling)



Company: Homeward Partners

Location: Remote (Central Time)

Job Type: Full-Time | 44–48 hrs/week

Compensation: Base Pay + Commissions + Performance Bonuses



About Homeward Partners



Homeward Partners is a fast-growing real estate investment firm specializing in acquiring off-market residential properties directly from homeowners. Our mission is to create win-win solutions — helping sellers achieve peace of mind while building strong, ethical real estate deals that create value for everyone involved.



We buy distressed, inherited, pre-foreclosure, vacant, or problem properties — always focusing on transparency, empathy, and integrity.



As an Acquisition Specialist, you are the first or second voice sellers hear from us — the bridge between their challenges and our solutions.



Your Mission



Your job is to connect with motivated sellers, uncover their real needs, and help negotiate win-win purchase agreements for our company.

You’ll represent Homeward Partners with professionalism, empathy, and drive — moving conversations from first contact to signed contracts.



Key Responsibilities



Seller Outreach & Communication

Call, text, and
 inbound/outbound seller leads.

Build rapport and trust through active listening, not pressure tactics.

Qualify sellers based on motivation, timeline, property condition, and financial situation.

Ask diagnostic questions to uncover challenges like inheritance, title issues, or foreclosure risks.



Deal Analysis & Negotiation

Evaluate property values using tools like PropStream, Zillow, or Redfin.

Analyze motivation and market data to make fair, strategic offers.

Negotiate purchase agreements that align with company goals while maintaining win-win outcomes for sellers.

Submit qualified deals to the Disposition Team with all relevant details and comps.



CRM & Follow-Up Management

Maintain consistent CRM updates for every seller conversation, note, and offer.

Schedule timely follow-ups for unconverted leads.

Track and report KPIs such as calls made, quality conversations, offers presented, and contracts signed.



Team Collaboration

Coordinate with the Disposition Team to ensure deal handoffs are smooth.

Share feedback and insights from sellers to improve marketing and acquisition targeting.

Participate in sales meetings, training sessions, and roleplays to sharpen skills.



Tools You’ll Use

CRM: ReSimpli or Podio

Dialer: CallTools, Readymode, Mojo, BatchDialer

Property Data: PropStream, Zillow, Redfin, ChatGPT (for comps)

Communication: Google Workspace, Slack, WhatsApp

Tracking: Google Sheets, KPI dashboards



Qualifications

1–2 years of experience in real estate acquisitions, cold calling, or high-volume sales.

Excellent English communication skills (verbal and written).

Strong negotiation and problem-solving skills with a focus on empathy.

Organized, detail-oriented, and consistent with CRM documentation.

Comfortable working full-time U.S. hours (Central or Eastern Time).

Tech-savvy and able to learn new systems quickly.



Preferred Experience:

Prior experience talking to distressed or motivated sellers.

Understanding of real estate transactions, contracts, and title processes.

Familiarity with DISC personality profiles and rapport-based communication.



Compensation & Growth

Base hourly rate (DOE) + generous commissions per closed assignment

Performance-based bonuses

Paid training and continuous support

Clear promotion path to Senior Disposition Manager / Team Lead

Long-term opportunity with a fast-scaling U.S. investment firm



How to Apply

Please share a 1–2 minute video introduction in English talking about your background, communication experience, and why you’d be a great fit for this role.

Drop your WhatsApp as well for Quick Communication.

description:

About Homeward Partners



Homeward Partners is a fast-growing real estate investment company specializing in buying off-market residential properties and selling them to a curated network of cash buyers and investors. We focus on transparency, speed, and results — offering sellers quick, fair deals and investors high-value opportunities.



As our Disposition Manager, you’ll be responsible for turning signed contracts into closed deals — marketing properties, managing buyer relationships, negotiating assignments, and coordinating closings.



Core Mission

Your mission is simple: turn inventory into cash by selling contracts quickly and profitably while maintaining strong relationships with our investor network.



Key Responsibilities



Property Marketing & Buyer Outreach

Launch new deals to buyers within hours of contract execution.

Market properties using
 campaigns, CRM blasts,
 groups, Craigslist, and other investor channels.

Create engaging property listings and buyer packets with all key details (ARV, comps, rehab estimates, pictures).



Buyer Relations & Negotiation

Build, grow, and maintain a strong network of cash buyers and investor partners.

Negotiate assignment fees and contract terms that maximize company profit.

Follow up daily with buyers through calls, texts, and
s to create urgency and close quickly.



Transaction Coordination

Coordinate with title companies, escrow officers, and attorneys to ensure smooth closings.

Track deal progress, resolve title or buyer issues, and maintain clear communication across all parties.

Ensure accurate, compliant documentation for each transaction.



Market Research & Feedback Loop

Run comps using PropStream, Zillow, Redfin, and ChatGPT tools.

Stay updated on local market conditions, investor trends, and pricing benchmarks.

Provide insights to the acquisitions team for better property selection and pricing strategy.



Reporting & CRM Management

Keep CRM updated with all buyer interactions, notes, and statuses.

Track KPIs: time-to-market, engagement, contracts assigned, and closing ratios.

Generate weekly disposition performance reports for management review.



Tools You’ll Use

CRM: ReSimpli, Podio, or InvestorLift

Property Data: PropStream, Zillow, Redfin

Communication: CallTools / BatchDialer / Google Workspace

Marketing:
/SMS tools, Canva, ChatGPT,
/Craigslist

Tracking: Google Sheets, KPI Dashboards



Qualifications

1–3 years of experience in real estate wholesaling, dispositions, or investment sales.

Strong negotiation, relationship-building, and communication skills.

Confident with property valuation, comps, and real estate contracts.

Excellent written and spoken English.

Tech-savvy, detail-oriented, and capable of working independently.

Self-motivated and results-driven, with a passion for closing deals.

Preferred:



Existing network of U.S. real estate investors and cash buyers.

Familiarity with ReSimpli, InvestorLift, or similar CRM platforms.

Experience with
 marketing for real estate.

Compensation & Growth

Base hourly rate (DOE) + generous commissions per closed assignment

Performance-based bonuses

Paid training and continuous support

Clear promotion path to Senior Disposition Manager / Team Lead

Long-term opportunity with a fast-scaling U.S. investment firm



How to Apply

Please share a 1–2 minute video introduction in English talking about your background, communication experience, and why you’d be a great fit for this role.

Drop your WhatsApp as well for Quick Communication.

title: Customer Support Representative – Fashion E-commerce
description:
Customer Support Representative – Fashion E-commerce (Remote)



We are looking for an experienced Customer Support Representative to join our growing fashion e-commerce brands. You will be responsible for handling customer inquiries professionally, efficiently, and proactively.



This role is not for beginners. We are looking for someone who understands how fashion dropshipping stores operate and knows how to reduce refunds, chargebacks, and unnecessary escalations.



Responsibilities



Handle customer inquiries via
 and chat in a professional and friendly manner



Assist customers with order status, delivery questions, returns, and refunds



Apply predefined customer service frameworks and policies correctly



Proactively resolve issues before they escalate into disputes or chargebacks



Maintain a high level of accuracy and attention to detail



Communicate clearly with the internal team when needed



Requirements



Proven experience with fashion dropshipping stores



Strong understanding of shipping delays, returns, and refund handling



Excellent written English



Proactive mindset you do not wait for instructions



Able to follow SOPs and apply logic, not emotion



Reliable, structured, and consistent in daily performance



Experience with Shopify, Gorgias, Zendesk, Reamaze or similar tools is a plus



What We Offer



Fully remote position



Long term collaboration for the right candidate



Clear policies and workflows no guessing



Opportunity to grow within multiple fashion brands



Competitive compensation based on experience and performance



Important



To apply, include the word “Boston” at the beginning of your application so we know you have read this post carefully.

title: Client Success + Bonuses (Loom Voice Updates (not video) + WhatsApp) – Marketing Agency
description:
Role Summary



We’re a marketing agency working with Podiatrists accoss the UK and Aus and we need a VA who can communicate clearly, summarise information fast, and send professional client updates using Loom voice recordings and WhatsApp.



This role is mainly about communication + execution, not “admin busywork”.

You’ll act like a proactive assistant who helps things move forward without needing constant follow-ups.





Key Responsibilities



- Record Loom voice updates to explain tasks, results, and next steps

- Organise our website developer to make small website changes 

- Send WhatsApp updates to clients in a clean, confident, professional tone

- Organise information into simple checklists and next actions

- Ask questions when something is unclear (instead of guessing)

- Proactive in quickly replying to the clients on WhatsApp

- Must understand when a client might need extra support if results are down

- Must be able to send a daily end-of-day updates





Payment Bonus:



- You get a bonus based on how long you keep clients 

- You get a bonus if you upsell customers

- A pay review will happen after 30 days if you perform well



You’re a Good Fit If You…



- Speak and write clear, fluent English

- Can explain things simply and confidently

- Take initiative and think like an operator

- Are reliable with deadlines and follow instructions closely



Tools you will use:



- Loom

- WhatsApp

- ClickUp

- Google Sheets



Please complete to finalise the submission:



Short Loom introducing yourself (1–2 mins) with the camera on

 1.     Your name + location/timezone

 2. Your experience supporting businesses/clients

 3. Why you’re a fit for a communication-first VA role

 4. Your availability + how fast you can reply during work hours



- Start the application with "Dog", or you won’t be considered.

- Please follow the Loom video linked below, as you will be recording a variant of this.

It doesn’t need to be word-for-word — just match the same structure and key points. Please have the camera off for this. 



When you record your Loom, please make sure you have the website open on-screen:





Loom reference video:





We will start off with a paid trial if we are happy with your application
